campaign.story:
ACT SOCIAL DOCUMENTARY FILM FUNDING: PRODUCTION PHASE
Sometimes you have to improvise to compromise. 
Logline
Civil discourse is vanishing from modern society; Act Social explores the healing potential of applied improvisation.  Features famed improv comedian Colin Mochrie of Whose Line is it, Anyway?
↑↑↑↑ WATCH OUR TRAILER ABOVE ↑↑↑↑ 
Then check out more videos at: www.actsocialfilm.com
Story Summary
In improv, everyone's ideas have equal worth; this is what starting off on the right foot looks like.
Improvisation tools are already working in conflict resolution and mental health facilities, but on a small scale. Could they be used to heal the Israeli-Palestinian conflict or help 40 million people in the USA to get off of psychotropic drugs?
·  Republican Karl Rove performs improv with Colin Mochrie and endears himself to a room half-full with Democrats.
·  Dr. Daniel J. Wiener brings couples back from the brink of divorce using improv.  
·  Bob Kulhan, author of Getting to Yes And: The Art of Business Improv, teaches 40 Senators on their annual retreat to aid in their cross-aisle reaching. 
·  Brendan Fitzpatrick’s dad died in 9/11; he uses improvisation to help him overcome the tragedy.
·  Doctors help patients cure depression and social anxiety with improv techniques.
These stories and more combine to create a documentary about applied improvisation that entertains, enlightens, and offers a concrete, actionable solution to our tendency to de-humanize people with whom we disagree. 
Topic Summary
30% of the people we interviewed in a random cross-section of the population didn’t know what the word “improv” means.  The other 70% had no knowledge of how improv is done.  Not a single person we interviewed mentioned the key principle of improv: “Yes And.”
In Times Square, 1 in 3 people didn't know what improv was!
Digging a little further, I found that improv comedy classes are an extremely niche activity, with less than 5 million people taking part worldwide.  In comparison, 265 million people currently take part in organized soccer leagues.  
To the general public, improv is a mysterious and unknown entity even though the sketch comedy show, Saturday Night Live, which stars top improv comedians, gets at least 8 million viewers a week, and the improv comedy show Whose Line is it, Anyway? averages 2 million viewers a week.  Act Social will explain the public’s lack of interest in learning how to do improv.
Mindfulness, yoga, and meditation have had an explosion in growth in the last two decades.  The medical establishment has embraced mindfulness as a healing modality and patients can have those types of activities covered by health insurance.  If studies have shown improv to have the same kinds of therapeutic effects as mindfulness, why are so few doctors recommending it?  Act Social will explore this disparity. 
Applied improvisation specialists have had success reconciling refugees of genocidal civil war…so why aren’t the United Nations using more applied improvisation?  Act Social will explain why.
Artistic Approach
There a few unique styles we’ll use to serve different parts of the story:
In the section where we tell the history of improv, we’ll use fun animations.
One our animations by Cas Kowalewski.
The stories of our main subjects will be told through filming of behavior, archival footage, and confessional interviews.
Whenever onstage improv performance is shown, we’ll use rockumentary style shots.
Interviews on the street will have a “Good Morning America” feel, as we connect to the general public to test their improv knowledge.
Project Stage and Timeline 
Development.  We have shot over 40 hours of interviews with star Colin Mochrie, and top applied improvisation teachers like Bob Kulhan, Barbara Tint, and Brad Fortier.  This summer we will shoot with Mick Napier of Annoyance Theatre, Patricia Madson, author of Improv Wisdom, and original SNL writer, Anne Beatts.  We'll also do additional shoots with our main protagonists like Brendan Fitzpatrick of Tuesday's Children.  
We’ve already shot improv for conflict resolution classroom footage, as well as person-on-the-street interviews.  I have read every improv book I can get my hands on and researched the history of the art dating back to the early 1900s.  
We will culminate our shooting with a performing and teaching tour that will end up at the United Nations and Capitol Hill.
We will wrap up production by early Summer 2020, and be ready to submit to Sundance in Fall 2020.
Audience and Distribution
Distribution and Marketing Strategy
We have a bona fide television star in the film, Colin Mochrie.  We will use his interest in the field of applied improvisation to promote the film. There has been an explosion of stand up comedy specials on Netflix and as we mentioned before there is a huge interest in improv comedy in this country.
Intended Audience 
Our main target is lovers of stand up, improv comedy, The Office, Whose Line is it, Anyway? and Curb Your Enthusiasm fans.  That market is in the tens of millions in the U.S. alone.  Beyond that, we want to set up special screenings for people dealing with social anxiety disorder or depression.  
Audience Engagement and Social Impact
I feel very strongly about getting 100 million people improvising by 2025.  In the next six years, if we can train 1 million teachers to competently teach a Level 1 theatre improv class, and each of those teachers trains 100 students in the seventh year—we’ve hit 100 million improvisers.  
"Zip-zap-zop" is a well-known improv warmup game.
That concrete goal is great to shoot for, but philosophically for me it’s less about hitting a number and more about getting “Yes And” thinking diffused into the vernacular of everyday speech—with those saying it having had the physical experience of Improv Level 1 to back up the words.
We will encourage our audience to find the improv school in their city—and we plan to start an online improv school for those in rural communities.  One of the places we hope people will be able to go one day is to an online “Rec Room”  to meet other members of the Act Social Club.  There, people could pick an avatar and improvise with others from around the world.
Director/Producer Bio
Sean A. Mulvihill is known for creating and starring in the 2007 docu/drama feature film, Living Luminaries: On the Serious Business of Happiness. The film stars Eckhart Tolle (The Power of Now), 2020 presidential candidate Marianne Williamson, Don Miguel Ruiz (The Four Agreements), and Rev. Michael Bernard Beckwith.  www.livingluminaries.com
Sean resides in New York City and is the Artistic Director of the Exuberants Improv Comedy Team which tours the greater NYC area.  A trained actor, clown and mime, Sean is fluent in Italian and holds an MFA in Physical Theatre from the Accademia dell'Arte in Arezzo, Italy and a BFA in Acting from the University of Southern California.  www.seanamulvihill.com
Fundraising Strategy and Crowdfunding Impact
We are piecing together the additional funding needed by submitting grant proposals to Sundance Institute and IDA.  If we don't receive the institutional funding we have requested, we may launch a second Kickstarter for post-production funds next year.  Any remaining money will come from this current crowdfunding campaign and from my own investment.
Funding to Date
So far, I have put about $20,000 of my own money into the project.  
Amount Requested/Funding Impact of Production Phase 
We have already met our base goal of $5000.  Thanks to those who have pledged already.  This money will be used for 3 things:
1.  Production expense of a film shoot on-location in Chicago with Annoyance Theatre founder, Mick Napier, famed improviser Susan Messing, and applied improviser, Dr. Kristin Krueger.  
2.  Animation to illustrate key portions of our story.
3.  Production expense of a film shoot on-location in Washington, D.C., where we'll lobby politicians to give improv a try.
Stretch Goal
We reached our goal!  Now it's time to STRETCH!
I believe the most important thing we can do with Act Social is to give people from all walks of life a chance to try improv.  Most improv schools are in cities and the rural segment of the population does not have easy access to them.  So we want to take the improv to them! 
We plan to hit the road and go on tour to bring free improv shows/workshops to rural communities more than an hour’s drive from an improv class.  Alternatively, we'll bring improv to poorer areas of larger cities where residents are less likely to venture out to take a class.  We'll bring our cameras and tell the stories of these people learning improv for the very first time.
It will cost around $2000 to get our cast and crew to each city on the tour, so the more we raise, the more towns we can improvise with!
Current Sample
Please visit our website www.actsocialfilm.com to see the videos there which we’ve made to explain our project and the task at hand.
Rewards
“Your film is cool but…what’s in it for me?”
Rest assured we have AMAZING rewards for backers of this campaign. Read on for some highlights:
Pledge $150 VIP Colin Mochrie Experience 
You'll get 2 free tickets to any live Colin Mochrie improv comedy show: (1) HYPROV: Improv Under Hypnosis or (2) Colin and Brad: Scared Scriptless. You also get a VIP Meet and Greet with Colin Mochrie himself after the show! Subject to availability, check Colin's website for show dates near you.
  Pledge $10 or more
Alphabet Scene Based on Your Name
 
           Cast member(s) will record and perform an improvisation Alphabet Game scene based on your first and last name. The two characters in the scene must use the letters of your first and last name in order to start each line of dialogue. So for the name Sean it might go:
           "See my shorts?" 
           "Every time I see you in those Bermuda shorts, I think about Jamaica." 
           "All those nights at the tiki bar" 
           "No worries, just mojitos and Elvis impersonators."
           The first letter of each line spells out S-E-A-N. You'll get a scene with your whole name!! 
Pledge $25 or more
Extended Edition Digital Download
           You’ll be able to download and enjoy the feature film for as long as you live.
           Plus you'll be the first to own the extended special features with tons of exclusive content including extended interview footage with our stars:
           Colin Mochrie of "Whose Line is it, Anyway?"
           Barbara Tint of Applied Improvisation Network
           Bob Kulhan of Business Improv
           Andy Eninger of Second City
           Norm Laviolette of Improv Asylum
           Mick Napier of Annoyance Theatre
           Dr. Daniel J. Wiener, author of Rehearsals for Growth
           and more!
Pledge $50 or more
Online Solo Improvisation Training
Andy Eninger on set of Act Social
 
           This 2-video series from acclaimed Second City solo improv star, Andy Eninger, will focus on the solo improv skills that can get you up to speed as an autonomous, 1-person show! Andy's solo show format, The Sybil, is famous worldwide and he coaches internationally for Second City as well.
Pledge $65 or more
 Autographed copy of Getting to Yes And by Bob Kulhan 
Bob will write a special inspirational message in the book especially for you. 
Pledge $65 or more
 Autographed copy of Making Shit Up by Norm Laviolette, Improv Asylum CEO 
Norm will write a special inspirational message in the book especially for you. 
Pledge $65 or more:  Autographed Copy of Improv Wisdom
Patricia Madson, the author, is a professor emerita at Stanford University where she teaches improv. She'll write a special inspirational message in her book, "Improv Wisdom," just for you.
Pledge $75 or more:  E-Signed Director's Cut Digital Download
       This limited edition download will be "e-signed" and “doodled” by hand by the director using an Apple Pencil. He'll include a special drawing and inspirational note just for you. This will contain a special director's cut of the film and an exclusive blooper reel! 
Pledge $100 or more: 2 Gala Premiere Tickets
You'll get 2 tickets to the gala premiere of Act Social. We'll screen the film and have a party where you'll get to mingle with the stars of the movie (Travel not included)!
Pledge $150 or more
1 Hour Coaching Session with Rehearsals for Growth author Dr. Daniel J. Wiener 
 
           Dr. Daniel J. Wiener has helped hundreds of couples and families with his Rehearsals for Growth modality, which uses improv games in family therapy. 
Pledge $150 or more
Mentorship Call with Barbara Tint of AIN
 
           Barbara is a trained improviser and the President of the Applied Improvisation Network--and she'll be calling you to give you her expert input on...whatever you want to talk about! On this 1-hour call you can pick her brain about improv for conflict resolution or exchange ideas for creative projects.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The main risk/challenge associated with this project is that if we don't raise all the money we need, we could end up with a half-finished project, or a project at a much lower quality than we hoped for. This is why we are setting a goal which gives us enough to shoot all the footage we need and create the animations essential to our film's storytelling. We are expecting the finishing funds for post-production to come from our institutional funding requests that are currently pending.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Spanish Subtitles are Ready!  If you login with your Youtube link, you can choose Spanish Subtitles in your options.

Also, last chance to sign up for Kristin Krueger's Class "Mental Health + Improv for Providers," It starts tomorrow.  Sign up at: https://actsocial.club/product/mental-health-improv-workshop-for-providers/

updates.update_userinfo: Why Jamming is the New Meditation
updates.update_content:
Hi Backers,
There is a lot of exciting stuff going--the film will be delivered to you all Friday, and Sunday we're having a big premiere gala, so lot's to celebrate.  

We're also launching the Act Social Club March 2.  The Act Social Club is an online improvisation training center focused on authentic acting skills (my area of professional expertise).  So much of life requires authenticity, yet it is not a skill widely taught.  I'd like to change that.

Hey All,
At the gala premiere, Margot Escott (host of “Improv Interviews” podcast) will be moderating the post-film Q and A—and Colin Mochrie has just confirmed he will be in attendance, so come with your curiosity!

There are limited spaces available for the Feb. 28 gala at http://actsocialfilm.com/store

updates.update_userinfo: Streaming/Download Delivery Date and Time + Jam Schedule
updates.update_content:
Hi Backers!  

Thank you so much for being a part of this project and for supporting applied improvisation and drama therapy. With any luck (and lots of social media sharing), in a few short weeks we will be diffusing the good new about "Yes And" around the world many times over.

Hey Everybody,

Our Production Intern at Exuberant Theatre Company, Robert D'Elia, has cut a great trailer (below) for Act Social Film--remember the premiere gala with Colin Mochrie will be February 28!  Buy Tickets to the Gala

updates.update_userinfo: SAVE THE DATE: Act Social Online Premiere Gala-Sun. Feb. 28, 6:15pm

Hello,

campaign.story:
Easy Profit Game is a game designed to make making money fun! It’ll teach you skills that can be used in real life & in business.
Play CEO as you navigate through opportunities and pitfalls in the game. Make tough calls that can risk your profits or give you the ultimate climb at the end of the year.
Look, we get it - finance may not look like the most fun thing to do. It seems super complicated and, to be honest, difficult. But it doesn’t have to be that way. We first made Easy Profit Game to teach franchise owners how to run their business finances. We didn’t want to use another boring training manual, so we turned finance into an easy to learn, easy to play, game.
Your goal in Easy Profit Game is simple - MAKE THE MOST PROFIT!
Though the goal is simple, the steps to get there will have plenty of challenges. You’ll be required to make tough decisions, possibly take loans, and balance risk & reward. 
For more details, visit www.EasyProfitGame.com in the “Run Your Business” section.
The journey will teach you valuable lessons and skills needed to properly run a business and maximize your profits!
The Month to Month
These moves will either increase your sales, cost you big, or both. Fill in the blanks on the game sheets to ultimately determine your End Of Year Profits!
Sales Cards
But don’t just take everything as it comes, sometimes a gain now will cost later. Conversely, taking a loss now may mean larger earnings later. Pay close attention to each opportunity and weigh your options carefully.

Company Cards
Every company runs into operational situations that require extra capital. Initially, these may come across as annoying expenses, but don’t be so quick to judge. Sometimes, these expenses can end up being profitable investments. 
Learn how to deal with operational expenses and flip them to not just keep your company afloat but to turn a HUGE PROFIT.
Taking Loans
The CEO can make a decision to take a long-term loan and get some immediate cash to keep the company going through the year. However, this will affect your end of year profits (overall results for the game).
If your bank account does drop to zero, you are required to take a loan as a company can’t operate on negative cash.
End of Month Reports
At the end of each month (round), each company is required to report its progress. This is an amazing time to see how your competition is faring and see if you need to reevaluate your plans.
The progress is reported by looking at the bottom line to see if it was positive or negative. If it was positive then the Economic Health card turns to the black (black side up) indicating that the company is making money. If the bottom line is negative them the Economic Health card turns to the red (red side up) indicating that the company is losing money. Economic health is determined by the collective performance of companies in the same region (group of teams). When your month ends, look around at the other teams to check the status of their Economic Health cards to determine if you will use declining, stable or growing revenue amounts for the next month.
Extra Tips 
Learn to listen to other companies and your partners as you play. They may have solutions or ideas that may help you with your current situation or next. Trade knowledge and ideas, and you may find that a win-win approach may end up serving you the best. 
When the year is closed, the winner of the game is determined by the highest profit. But where the game ends, life continues. Talk with your fellow players and reflect over what lessons were learned through the game. How will this affect your personal finances, how you run your business, or how you navigate through work?
Easy Profit Game was first created to be a fun way to teach franchisees how to handle and run their business finances.
They raved about how practical and fun it was and brought the samples to their own families. Soon enough, kids and teenagers were joining them in learning vital skills on how to run a business - all while having a blast with their families!
Now, Easy Profit Game is coming to you. Get your friends and family engaged and excited as you all become financially literate and start GAINING PROFIT!
 We will start shipping games approximately 2 months after the end of the Kickstarter campaign.
Jerrod Sessler, a former NASCAR driver, technology engineer, and Navy Petty Officer, has always been an innovator. In 1999, after being diagnosed with stage four metastasized melanoma, and given a five percent chance of survival, Jerrod opted to pursue alternative means of treatment by moving to a plant-based diet. Now, twenty years after his grim diagnosis, Sessler is fit, healthy and cancer free without conventional medical treatment.
In 2004 Sessler founded HomeTask, a service company using the franchising business platform to grow great brands such as Pet Butler, Lawn Army, and Yellow Van Handyman. The company has grown by franchising branded locations nationwide. Sessler received dual engineering degrees in manufacturing and mechanical and has brought his systems knowledge into the franchising industry. As a result of his passion for health and fitness, Jerrod founded Freggies, an organic produce delivery service, and Hot Feet Fitness, a workout, stretch & yoga studio concept.
Sessler was nominated as the Small Business Association (SBA) Person of the Year in 2007 and was named SBA Veteran Champion of the Year in 2010 for his work in offering significant discounts to veterans so that they can start their own businesses. In 2009 Sessler became a published author with his book “Five Percent Chance,” which shares his story of surviving cancer and taking responsibility for his health.  He later authored “Food Chains” and “Five Minute Workout” in 2013. These days you can find Sessler spending time with his family, leading the HomeTask Network, and serving in his hometown of Burien, Washington.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We've worked extremely hard to prepare this product for Kickstarter and full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as the risks and our plan to assess them:
 
 MANUFACTURING: The manufacturer is lined up and we have done testing with all of the various game pieces.
 
 FULFILLMENT: Barring any odd circumstances, there are no obstacles with regards to fulfillment that we anticipate. Our manufacturing partner is set to assemble the game for us and we have designed into the product a special shipping box so the game remains protected during its journey to your living room table.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
PLENTY OF TIME TO PLAY!!!
Right now, you likely have some time to get the Easy Profit Game out and give it a play! Go ahead, put your downtime to work for your future with a little gaming fun!
Let me know if you have questions on how to play.
Thank you, again, for supporting the Kickstarter and sharing this great learning game with your friends.

Thank you so much for your tenacity through these many (too many) months!  We started shipping games yesterday afternoon so it is likely that your game is on the way!
We are missing addresses for about 40 people so please contact me if you do not get your game within the next 7-10 days.
How about a SPECIAL OFFER?  Need a great gift for a friend, coworker or family member? Because of your support and patience, we are offering "DOUBLE YOUR ORDER" for free with free shipping through the end of January.  Order 1 game and we will ship 2.  Order 5 games and we will ship 10!

updates.update_userinfo: Easy Profit Game Update "We are almost to the end"
updates.update_content:
Hello Awesome Backers!
I know it's been a long time since the last update. Rest assured we have been working hard behind the scenes to get the games produced, ready for shipping and get it into your hands.
Where are we right now in the process?

Just a quick note to confirm that the game has been produced and is prepped for shipping.
I am disappointed that I did not get the detail that I wanted to see during the assembly process in terms of how the game went together but I will open one as soon as they arrive and (fingers crossed) hope that all is as designed.  If not, I'll let you know what to expect.
Shipping is about three weeks I am told and I will be ready with labels in hand to start shipping them out to you when they arrive!

updates.update_userinfo: Games packed and starting their journey to Seattle
updates.update_content:
I live in Seattle.  So, the games will be bulk shipped to me so that I can apply individual shipping labels to them so they can make their way to you!
The games have been made!  I was able to watch the process on video and through some images.  They will be on a ship on Dec. 1st.   It will take 4-6 weeks for them to arrive in Seattle, clear customs and get into my hands so I can start putting individual labels on them.  This is where having 3 kids and an amazing wife will be helpful!  Together, we can prep, pack, and take everything to the post office in just a few hours.

I am seeing images this week of the game pieces in production.  I anticipate seeing a video of a sample game being assembled with a week and then they should be set up for shipping which will take 4-5 weeks.  More news when they are set for shipping and I have more firm dates.
Jerrod
Jerrod, Easy Profit Game founder, created a video update with production status.  Watch this video:  https://youtu.be/mjjnalPUZmc

Finally! It was one thing to create a game but getting it produced is an entirely new and different category of roadblocks!
I want the game to be the best quality possible. I won't bore you with the details but lets just say the first sample FREAKED ME OUT!  Not good enough for you for sure.
My understanding is that we are now about 40 days from receiving the games so I will make sure to have shipping labels printed and ready when they arrive so we can get them shipped out right away.

updates.update_userinfo: Easy Profit Game IS IN PRODUCTION!!!
updates.update_content:
Thank you to everyone that backed the game!  We are excited to roll forward with many other opportunities for the game and to get you your copy.  I am working full steam on manufacturing a truly great game that you will be proud to own, share and learn from now.  
I mentioned in a previous update that I anticipate shipping the games by early August so let me give you an update on where we are at. I did get the first sample of the produced game last week and it was good but not even close to the quality that I expect and I know you want. So, I feel that we will have 2 more rounds of samples at a minimum. Once I make the final approval for production, I will not see inside the boxes that get shipped to you. I will get the boxes and my family and I will print and stick mailing labels to them so I need to know for sure what they are putting in your box!

campaign.story:
After the kickstarter is over, you can purchase the book here.
To receive further updates, sign up for the daily-ish email here.
the couch beckons...
What this Book is About
This book is a rich collection of things you can do at home that make a huge, positive, global difference. Without politics or being angry at bad guys. This book features a strong focus on adding luxury to your life instead of sacrifice. And the frosting on the cake is saving a lot of money.  
There have been too many recent reports that have spelled out "it's too late." Maybe if the authors of those reports get this book, they will change their report to "there's still hope! If enough of us do the stuff in this book ...."
We all hear about the problems. And usually the solutions are to shake our fists at “the bad guys.” Personal solutions are often about sacrifice: be cold in the winter, eat sawdust, volunteer for dysfunctional organizations, write to politicians, travel less, buy crap marketed as “good for the environment,” take cold showers… I need to point out that most of that stuff makes almost no difference, and some of those things actually make the problems worse. In this book, I put a number on those things and I show the numbers for things that really make a HUGE difference.  Save the planet, turn the heat up in winter, take hot showers, eat delicious food, and save thousands of dollars along the way!
And most of all, no anger required. Go ahead and be angry at the bad guys if you want. But I wish to show you a path that will be a thousand times more effective. It turns out to be easy. 
Let’s get to it! I present the…
Table of Contents
Just a Taste of the Pretty Drawings
There is a bunch of artwork included in this book. Sometimes to clarify, sometimes to emphasize, and sometimes just for a bit of humor. Here's a mockup to give you an idea:
a sample of the delicious illustrations by Tracy Wandling
Budget
Here is my grand and especially well thought out budget to pull this project off. Presented as a high quality pie chart that I made myself.
WE ARE FUNDED IN 3 HOURS!!!
Umm... wow... umm... that was fast! Now it's time for some stretch goals!

Rewards
About the time of my fourth kickstarter, I had this powerful feeling of gratitude. How cool is it that so many people are trusting me with their coin for six months? I see other kickstarters that make it clear "we will sell this for $20 after the kickstarter, so give us $40 for it now." I think it should be the opposite of that. You are throwing your shoulder in with me to get this done. You are being far more trusting and supportive than people that wait. So I want you to have the best price, and lots of bonus candy! 
Rewards: THANKS ($1 and up)
First I have to explain something new we are trying in this kickstarter. The extra goodies are handed out as "gift codes." On my seventh kickstarter, some people said that the goodies didn't have value for them because they got most of those goodies in a previous kickstarter.   So this time I am handing them out as gift codes. You can give them to yourself or give them to somebody else.
4 gift codes for the Permaculture Playing Cards as an ebook: My third kickstarter was the permaculture playing cards. Each card covers a powerful aspect of permaculture. Some feature people, some feature a philosophy, and some feature a technique. There's so many details on every card that it takes about an hour and a half to read them all!
4 gift codes for Care and Feeding of a Rocket Mass Heater: The microdoc from the kickstarter for the 4-DVD set "Better Wood Heat: DIY Rocket Mass Heaters." Switching from electric heat to a rocket mass heater can reduce your carbon footprint as much as parking seven cars! This is a DIY wood burning contraption that can heat your home with one-tenth the wood that a conventional wood stove uses, and puts out about a hundredth of the smoke. This is a 30-minute video showing five different people using a rocket mass heater and talking about their favorite way to light and care for rocket mass heaters.
4 gift codes for Cooking with a Rocket Oven: The microdoc from the kickstarter for the Rocket Ovens DVD. A rocket oven has a lower footprint than any other kind of oven. And rather than bringing in electricity, propane, or natural gas, a rocket oven can run on nothing but the sticks that fall in your yard - truly off grid. They can also heat up in less than 15 minutes and put out barely any smoke. This video is a 19 minute video of starting and tending a rocket oven, complete with footage of delicious-looking food coming out of the oven.
4 gift codes for Hugelkultur: The microdoc from the kickstarter for the 3-DVD set "World Domination Gardening.” This 16 minute video covers Hugelkultur, a gardening technique that builds amazing soil and after a few years can completely eliminate the need for irrigation. Once set up, Hugelkultur beds can drastically reduce the amount of work involved in growing your own food and reducing a significant source of your carbon footprint.  
 21 Podcast Review of Sepp Holzer’s Permaculture. This book by Sepp Holzer is one of my favorite books. He details a way of working with nature to solve problems that is absolutely genius. In these recordings, I spent roughly 25 hours reviewing every page and hashing through every detail of this amazing book.
 Public Thanks: I've seen some other kickstarters do this and I think we do it much, much better. They post your name to a facebook page where it is lost and forgotten within a couple days. We post it to our thread at permies.com where we have perennial discussions. Thousands of people will actually look at the list for years to come. And, naturally, we will give you a chance to be as creative and as silly as you want. While some people will post their names, or their kids, or maybe plug their business, you can also divulge your plans for world domination and give yourself all the galactic titles you want. Check out the thanks page from our last kickstarter and the one before that.
Rewards: CANDY ($5 and up)
 Permaculture Experience ebook (gift code).   Also known as the PEP book.  This version of the book is called "version 0.7 beta" - so it is an early draft.   And even in its early state, people are enjoying it.  This is a long list of experiences that you can do at home.   And when each experience is complete, you post a picture and have your experience verified.  When you have completed enough experiences, you are "PEP1 Certified."  Details here and here.
4 gift codes for HD streaming of the Building a Cob Style Rocket Mass Heater DVD. This video shows the full build of a rocket mass heater in a log structure and another full build of a rocket mass heater in a tipi. This is the crown jewel from the kickstarter for the 4-DVD set "Better Wood Heat: DIY Rocket Mass Heaters."
4 gift codes for The Design and Build of the Giant Solar Food Dehydrator. In this 1 hour and 21 minute video from the kickstarter for the Rocket Ovens DVD, you can follow along with the group at an Appropriate Technology Course as they discuss the merits of design elements, and then go on to the build of the dehydrator.
4 gift codes for the 5 hour video tour of Wheaton Labs from the kickstarter for recording the 2017 Permaculture Design Course and Appropriate Technology Course held at Wheaton Labs.
 Access to the permies.com "Secret Inner Circle" forum: Join our past kickstarter supporters in a place where you can talk about stuff without the prying eyes of google or "them".
Rewards: Physical Copies or eBook Copies ($25 and up)
This book was written with the idea that people might buy a bunch of books to give to others in an effort to affect significant change through mass education.
Once the kickstarter is over, everybody will get a kickstarter "survey" so I can get all sorts of details from you about your preferences. People that supported the kickstarter at $25 or more will be asked how many physical books they want. The remaining number that they paid for will be converted 3-to-1 from physical books to eBook gift codes.
For example, at the $100 level, folks can choose between 12 physical books or 36 ebook gift codes. Or a mix! The survey question will ask how many physical books you want. Maybe you will put in "8." So the remaining 4 books are converted, 3-to-1, to 12 eBook gift codes. I will send you 8 physical books and 12 eBook gift codes.
Some people have asked "how do the shipping fees work?" Unfortunately we do not have the ability to scale shipping fees based on the number of physical books selected at a particular reward level. Each reward level has a set shipping fee associated with it according to location. If you are getting only ebook gift codes, then you can select "US Virgin Islands" as your shipping location and the shipping charge will be $0 and you will receive 0 physical books.  It's not perfect, but it's the best we can do within the system.
And if you are actually in the US Virgin Islands and want physical copies... get in touch and we'll figure something out.

Rewards: GLORY ($100 and up)
 Put your most creative name in the book! (80 character limit). We will reserve a page (more if needed) that says "Thanks to our Magnificent Kickstarter Supporters!" Your name appears in our book! Or maybe "in memory of ____" or "mysuperhomestead.com" or "The Fabulous Finnegan Family" or "Paul Wheaton stinks of old fish" or "There once was a gal from Nantucket ..."  or maybe it is time you gave yourself some excellent galactic titles like "His Grace, the Duke of Soft Cheeses" or "Supreme Ruler of the Bacteria in my Garden".
Early access to the rough manuscript, plus the opportunity to give last minute feedback.
Rewards: ROCKET ($150 and up)
1 gift code for HD streaming of the rocket mass heater 8-DVD set. This 8-DVD set is a combination of the Wood Burning Stoves 2.0 4-DVD set and the Better Wood Heat: DIY Rocket Mass Heaters 4-DVD set, both projects from previous kickstarters.
1 gift code for HD streaming of the Rocket Ovens DVD from my last kickstarter. This video covers, in intricate detail, the building of a rocket oven that is better for the environment than any other kind of oven. 
Rewards: PDC and ATC ($200 and up)
 100 hour recording of the 2017 Permaculture Design Course at Wheaton Labs. Even if you already have decades of homesteading experience, this course will show you how to think like a designer. It covers permaculture design concepts and themes, climate and land forms, working with water, soil quality and care, trees, crops, microorganisms, sustainable livestock management, botany, and so much more! You can fit a lot of great info into 100 hours!
 77 hour recording of the 2017 Appropriate Technology Course at Wheaton Labs. In this course you will learn the thought process and practical steps for building systems that help you live both sustainably and comfortably. This course covers solar power, cooling strategies for warm climates, heating strategies for cold climates, home water systems, and many other appropriate technology solutions.
About the Authors
Paul Wheaton is a giant doofus who is bonkers about permaculture. He won’t shut up about permaculture. On and on, every day ... it’s annoying. He has gone so far as to make a 3-DVD set that is just about the earthworks for permaculture gardening. And not only did he make a 4-DVD set about rocket mass heaters, but he made ANOTHER 4-DVD set about rocket mass heaters. Why on earth do people need 8 DVDs about something so simple? If you think that is ridiculous, take a look at his 177 hours of video of a full Permaculture Design Course, and Appropriate Technology course. Then there’s the cards. Okay, the permaculture playing cards are pretty cool. 
Before all of that, Paul created hundreds of podcasts, youtube videos, articles, and other bits and bobs about permaculture. That should have been the first sign, right there, that health professionals should have stopped all this. That, or his 26,000 forum posts at permies.com. And he has at least that many at his other site, CodeRanch.com. Oh, yeah, he used to be a software engineer before all this permaculture stuff.
  Shawn Klassen-Koop’s passion for building a better world grew from many years of working at a summer camp. This time inspired awe and wonder for the natural world through many hours camping in the woods, paddling on a lake, or sleeping under the stars. Seeking to solve world problems with clever thinking, Shawn decided to pursue computer engineering as a career, where he learned the importance of good design and strong critical thinking. In time he felt like modern technology was causing more problems than it was solving and started looking for a better way. It was then that he stumbled upon and fell in love with permaculture as a way to use his design skills to work with nature rather than against nature. Shawn was preparing to start his own homestead when he was faced with serious health challenges that prevented him from doing any physical work. It was during this time that the opportunity to work on this book came up. Shawn jumped on it, wanting to do whatever he could to share these ideas with others.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
A lot of kickstarters want to get funding before the people doing the kickstarter have done much of anything. Before they have any skin in the game. We have been working on this book now for over a year and have already finished writing all 32 chapters (plus 2 appendices) and revised them numerous times along the way. We have brought this project as far as we can before paying for artwork, editing, layout, printing, and a few other bits and bobs. So all of the challenges writers face are behind us. Now we face the exciting world of “self pub” which is new to us. We have made a detailed list of who we have selected to process every step, but this is our first time and we are nervous about entering into something we have not done before.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Just a few hours left; We cleared 22 stretch goals!
updates.update_content:
It's now or never!  The package dealio ends when the SKIP kickstarter ends.
What a joy ride!  So many people with so many kind words!  And so many people putting actual coin in.  Thanks thanks thanks all you fantastic people!
I think this book will lead to massive, global change.  Mike and I have heard from dozens of people with land that are excited about this program.  And we are seeing a lot more people documenting their SKIP achievements since the kickstarter began.
And ...  this is our most massive pile of stretch goals we have ever had for any kickstarter.  The mega list:

updates.update_content:
I made a thing and gave it to you.  If you can read this, you can see the thing with every post you write at permies.  There is a green "K" next to your account name.  You can test it on the thread about the current kickstarter:

https://permies.com/wiki/skip-book

updates.update_userinfo: The new kickstarter is now live!
updates.update_content:
Back it now, for even $1, and get ALL 29 of the things in the all-new super earlybird package!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/paulwheaton/skip-0?ref=7rwi3v

Apparently one of you pushed a button and now the kickstarter robot is bugging me to give you all an update.
Well, there is a big update.  I wrote another book and am gearing up to do another kickstarter.
The SKIP book kickstarter is now being reviewed by Kickstarter Inc.  While we wait for their approval, you can see the preview page here:

I did the poor man's poll to see if enough people would put up coin at a really low price to justify getting 10,000 books printed (instead of, say, 1000, or just turning the book over to one of those pricey print-on-demand things).  Enough people said "yes!"  Spiffy!   So the order is in and today is the day to fork over that coin.   Only we are about 50% short from what folks said they would put in!

oh no oh no oh no oh no oh no oh no oh no

So I need folks to put their money where their "thumbs up" is.   And maybe a few people that were on the fence before will now be thinking that it sounds good to them now.  

The printer says the books should arrive here just before thanksgiving.  So they will probably get to you about a week after Thanksgiving.  The holidays would be an excellent time to hand out 64 books to:

- brothers, sisters, parents, kids, other family
- neighbors, friends, co-workers, colleagues
- boyfriend, girlfriend, spouse, romantic interest
- grandchildren, grandparents
- master gardeners or people in local permie groups
- permie library, coffee shop library, airbnb library
- public library, school library
- tiny neighborhood library
- doctor/dentist office
- people into this sort of thing
- people at church

with a few left over for

- birthday presents
- earth day presents
- gifts to people that attend workshops/presentations
- sell at fundraisers
- local NPR fundraisers
- people attending cool events

Maybe split a big order with a friend?

With this big of order, these prices are as cheap as $3.30 per book - to you.  

I think that this book makes for POWERFUL global change for the better - provided that enough people read it.  YOU have had a chance to read it.  I've heard from hundreds of you that agree.  Look at the reviews on amazon and other online places.   This book DOES make a difference.  A REAL difference.  REAL change.  POSITIVE change.  

In my deeply biased opinion, I think this is a freaky cheap way to solve a lot of global problems.  Super duper freaky cheap.

Thanks for helping me get out of this pickle.

Interest was really BIG! Let's do it!

It looks like it is time to talk about printing more.   If I set the price for a dozen freaky low, will people want to buy lots?  Maybe give them out?  I set up a thread to make suggestions for giving them out and to do a sort of "poor man's poll" to see if we set the price this low, will people actually pony up for pre-orders of the second printing.
The reviews are in - the book is excellent!  And the experts have reported:  this book WILL cause global positive change, if enough people read it.

campaign.story:
To get more technical, Hush Iced relaxes the nervous system by simulating deep touch pressure therapy -- which increases serotonin and melatonin levels while decreasing cortisol levels -- improving your mood and promoting restful sleep at the same time. 
Hush Iced is unique in that it provides a cooler way to reap the benefits of weighted blankets. 
Did you know that when you’re getting ready to take a snooze, your body temperature decreases to initiate sleep? Science shows that room temperature should be between 68-72 degrees for the optimum sleep benefits. 
Hush Iced can help you get there by preventing you from overheating, even during the nastiest heat wave. 
Hush Iced uses the same advanced weight distribution technology as the classic Hush Blanket, but with a lighter, cool-to-the-touch cover. Hush Iced’s proprietary bamboo and cotton blend helps wick away sweat during hot summer months, while still providing weighted relief.
 At Hush, we believe in love at first sleep! If you do not absolutely love your blanket after night one, we will give you 99 more tries or your money back!
 Two years ago, we came up with the idea for the Hush Blanket, a weighted blanket designed for those who wanted to relax and fall asleep, fast. But we noticed one thing, Hush was great during fall and winter, even during spring, but it was admittedly hard to use during the grueling, hot summer months. And we found that was the case with most other weighted blankets.
We set out to change that.
Hush Iced was created for use even when it’s hot out, with an amazing breathable fabric and a lighter, cool-to-the-touch cover, so you can stay cool and calm all summer long.

 This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 650+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $300MM raised between them.
 We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Hush a reality. 
We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a Hush Iced blanket, if you’re a supporter of Hush, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of! 
Check out our other weighted blankets in Canada.

Your Hush Iced blankets will be shipping July 2019! We’re able to get them to you so soon because we are backed with great manufacturers who lead the production of our first Hush blankets. 
International shipping costs will be paid after the campaign when accurate shipping costs are calculated for your country.
If we get enough pledges from each country, we can send your Hush blankets in bulk, which would cost even less in shipping!
In addition, not charging international shipping on Kickstarter means it’s excluded from Kickstarter’s commissions -- and we can pass those savings on to you!
You will be able to choose different add-ons and update your shipping addresses 1-2 weeks after the campaign ends in the post-campaign survey, which can affect shipping price. We do ask that you include a physical address -- no P.O. Boxes, please!
You will also be responsible for all international duties. U.S. and Canadian orders will not incur duties.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are always certain risks that can arise at any moment during a project like this. That being said, we’re confident in our ability to produce, and have taken all the necessary measures. We have a highly qualified team of engineers and have partnered with leading manufacturing and fulfilment companies around the world. We just need your help to bring everything to fruition. Don’t worry, we’re completely prepared to bring the Hush collection to your homes, and we have the manpower to make it happen, but if anything comes up along the way, you’ll be the first to know.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
What we put on our skin is just as important as what we put in our bodies.  Although the skin is the body's largest organ, many of us take it for granted.
               As part of Orijin's mandate to promote self-care and mindfulness, we’ve developed the 100% all-natural and biodegradable Orijin Sponge. Made from Japanese Konjac Plant Root and infused with anti-microbial bamboo charcoal, the Orijin Sponge will provide your skin with the TLC it deserves while also heightening your showering experience. 
 Most bathing sponges you’ll find in-store or online today are made with the use of chemicals, synthetic oils, plastic and artificial coloring. These “glorified plastic bags” as we like to call them, are a breeding ground for dank smells and bacterial growth, do absolutely nothing for our skin and take over 150 years to decompose!
Made completely from 100% all natural Konjac plant root, the Orijin sponge's powerful fibers are naturally alkaline and hydrating. In addition, the Orijin Sponge exfoliates even the most sensitive skin without irritation.
Infused with Bamboo Charcoal, the Orijin Sponge is anti-microbial allowing the konjac fibers to absorb debris and impurities without allowing bacteria to grow or linger.
The Orijin Sponge is ergonomically designed to fit perfectly in hand while providing great coverage for an easy and thorough full body scrub down.
Said to have been discovered by Japanese farmers who used konjac to wash their babies' skin because of the plants gentle and natural features,  Konjac is native to Japan and has been used since the 6th century. 
When Dry, the Orijin Sponge is 3x smaller dimensionally and more than 11.5x lighter in weight. When dry the Orijin Sponge weighs only 17grams and when fully hydrated it increases to the perfect weight of 198g.
 Feel free to use the Orijin Sponge all over your body, especially on the chest, back & face.  These areas are easily acne-prone and need an extra deep clean. The Orijin Sponge is gentle enough to be used on sensitive areas, like around your eyes, while tough and sturdy enough for a full body scrub down. 
3D Design Rendering | Orijin Sponge
 The surface of the Orijin Sponge was designed to help channel water away from the surface for a better lathering experience and for more efficient drying time when the Orijin Sponge is not in use.   
 There’s no comparison. Based on our ergonomic size, design properties and environmental footprint we take the lead by a long shot. 
Just last year more that 4,000 awesome supporters brought The Thinking Egg (our previous campaign) to life, making it the most successful mindfulness tool to ever launch on Kickstarter. The feedback after having shipped on time to all of our supporters was awesome. We'll be continuing that tradition come fulfillment time for your Orijin Sponge!
 
   At Orijin, we intentionally design products that harmoniously intertwine form and function.
 Our hope is that we can provide you with products and ideas to help live a more present, aware and conscious life.
Thank you for taking a look at our campaign. If you have any questions, please reach out, we'd be happy to help!
   This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 650+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $300MM raised between them. 
This project is promoted by Green Inbox
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
While we have budgeted sufficient resources and time, we know that there might be things outside of our control and current visibility. That being said, we are extremely committed to doing everything in our power to solve any challenges that may arise along the way. That's a promise!

Our supply chain is tried and true. 
We have our manufacturing and operations all ready to go, and we've made sure to leave enough time so your Orijin Sponge/s arrive as planned. We are confident that our calculated plan will work effectively once we're funded, and that we'll be putting your Orijin Sponge in your hands no later than November!

Thank you in advance for making this project come to life ♥
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Reusability and recyclability
The Orijin Sponge is 100% natural and will slowly and naturally begin to fray after about 120-150 uses (anywhere from 5-8 months depending on how often you shower). Once it's begun to fray, you'll still be able to use the Orijin Sponge, but you will not receive the same benefits as you would with a fresh Orijin Sponge.

When you're done, you can simply compost the Orijin Sponge or put it in your planter to provide extra moisture and minerals to your good ol' plants!
Environmentally friendly factories
Because the Orijin Sponge is 100% natural, it'll simply decompose once you're done with it.

campaign.story:
Skip Ahead To: What's NEW?, Modern Warmth, How it Works, Tech Features, Size Specifications, Reward Options, Add on Options, Hot Pocket Timeline
 New Gear
 Does this sound familiar? 
Your evening meal still warm in your belly, the campfire now turned to red smoldering ashes. You fall asleep with a peaceful smile on your face, just to awaken suddenly at 2am by the shivering cold. You become restless, your teeth begin chattering, and you just can't get warm!
You’re miserable, freezing, rolling in and out of pitiful sleep knowing this is going to be a long, dreadful night. 
There are options for getting warm. But so few of them actually include SLEEP. 
And isn’t that what you came here to do? 
Now, imagine the same scenario. Only this time when you wake up cold at 2am, you simply drift right back off to sleep in a warm and toasty slumber, because instant warmth is at your fingertips by just the push of a button.
Modern Warmth 
In the past, our options for warming up in the wild have been limited (to say the least)...
 Chemical Hand Warmers? Awesome. My body has turned to ice, but at least my palms are sweating!  Besides, single use chemical warmers? They hit the trash and poison our planet, no thanks. 
 Heat up water in my Nalgene? Listen, I'm the only one that should be needing to take a leak here. Waking up soaked because my bottle decided to tinkle? That's a bit counterproductive to the mission here. (this has actually happened to me, not cool. COLD, yes. but way not cool)
 Do jumping jacks, push-ups, run in place? What is this? 24 Hour Fitness?! 2am is for restful, restorative sleep, NOT getting swole.
 What Else? Rekindle the fire, heat up a rock, snuggle a bear, crawl into the wolves den?!! Maybe! People get desperate when they're cold!  I don't know about you, but I make it a habit to avoid 3rd degree burns (or animal maulings) in the wild. 
..And the list of heat-producing methods goes on and on and on. Most of which do NOT actually involve sleeping through the night.
After more cold, sleepless nights in the wild than I care to admit, I vowed to fix this problem with a reliable, sustainable, and modern solution that does not require disrupting your cozy sleeping quarters in search of warmth.
and so... the Hot Pocket was born! 
 How it Works
What backers are saying:
"Have enjoyed two of the Sierra Madre products I've already backed and received and look forward to Ninox too. I trust this brand and have this exact problem with staying warm." 
"My wife is always cold, seems like a neat idea and might get us camping together more often!" 
"We are avid campers in the Rockies and this fit multiple needs including a space saver bag and a small heated blanket. I also love inventive ideas in the camping communities." 
 "I like the idea a lot. Using something that everyone already uses (stuff sack for sleeping bag) is a really smart idea. "
"I spend a lot of time in the backcountry in the winter and think that this is an outstanding safety device! The ability to warm an injured skier would be invaluable!" 
Founder/CEO Richard Rhett, discusses current prototypes and shows off the Small Hot Pocket. Though only a Single Panel prototype it jumped 20° F very quickly! The Double Radiant Heat Panels are obviously much faster, stay tuned for an update!  
Working Prototype
PLAY

 Tech Features
Size Specifications 
Reward Options  
 Add on Options
 Timeline
This project is promoted by Jellop, a direct­ response online advertising agency specializing in Kickstarter campaigns on Facebook Ads and Google AdWords.
These guys rock.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our sixth Kickstarter campaign, we've learned a lot throughout our last five campaigns - not to mention the last 9 years of business ;). We like to think that we're getting better and better at what we do. As with tackling anything new, we know there will be challenges along the way, we know there will be set backs, but rest assured we never slow down - not even a little. We're 115% pedal to the metal kinda company that doesn't take no for an answer.

There are a few items that could challenge us and our time line.
1) Battery design, this will be a new endeavor for us. We will be opening a mold and creating an electronically controlled battery bank - which we are crazy excited about. That said this is a brand new field for us and we are hedging our risk by partnering with a Best in Industry portable battery bank manufacturer (they build for Goal Zero). We know there will be many unforeseen challenges when we move to final production, but we're brave and ready to face them! 
2) Fabric, this is the second longest lead item in our supply chain and if the produced fabric does not meet our high quality control specifications it will have to be redone. This could cause an unforeseen delay. 
3) Shipping around the world always presents risk, we source from several suppliers around the world and our logistics web is quite complex - so there's always potential for crazy unexpected delays at home or abroad. PLEASE NOTE, ALL CUSTOMS / DUTIES IN YOUR COUNTRY ARE YOUR RESPONSIBILITY - THIS IS OUT OF OUR HANDS. Sometimes international shipments experience unforeseen delays that are out of our control. 
4) If we add-on any new products during this campaign, we could experience delays. 
5) If we receive a monstrosity of backers (awesome) we could experience a slight delay, however we do feel confident in our supply chain and it's scalability.

We are partnered with "Best in Industry" suppliers and manufacturers that not only represent high quality products but they also mirror our values as a company in 'better than fair' labor and excellent employee conditions. We put boots on the ground in all of the facilities we work with, inspecting the entire process of our products - ensuring most importantly that people are treated with respect, dignity, and fairness.

Please note that we are a small company and we are dependent on several other companies staying in business and doing their job well - so with the launch of new products we sure do appreciate your patience! Our policy is honesty, transparency, and customer service in every aspect of our business. You make this happen and we will do everything we can to exceed your expectations, serve you, and equip you for adventure! Thanks for joining us!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello wonderful backers! 
Hoping you are all doing well today! Hot Pockets are being received FINALLY! I know it's been a crazy wait. If you've received your Hot Pocket - send us a GearSelfie with it! (Submit it here) We'd love to see you enjoying your Hot Pocket!!!!

We are fulfilling orders based on the time the PCS was complete, as this is your actual order.

Hello Hot Pocket Backers! (read all of our updates here)
It's finally time for a (much needed) good news update! The entire first batch of the new graphene heat panels have been completed and shipped to George! Wahooo! FINALLY! 🎉
Normally George's Textile Factory requires a 4 month lead time to start a new project. Thankfully he was able to completely re-arrange his production schedule to accommodate the completion of the Hot Pocket product in July! You may be wondering, well why wasn't that already planned out (a fair question). The first time we planned this out George executed 10,000 Hot Pockets all the way to the final step, only lacking the heat panel, this was back in October of 2019. Then we ran into the brick wall of having to completely start over on the heat panel due to a poor performing supplier. He had to completely stop his production line because of this issue. Kinda like Tesla motor company's assembly line creating 10,000 vehicles and then not having the wheels to put on them. 🤦‍♂️

campaign.story:
At the End of 2014, we introduced the Esington Glass to the world on Kickstarter. With incredible support from the community, the project raised $196,560 with 2272 backers! 
After years of testing and feedback from the community, we're back to solve the biggest problem in timeboxing today: interruptions.
When you get interrupted mid-sprint, you can now stop time. 
a new superpower, just for you
"Got my Esington today and I am ecstatic! I can't believe how great you handled everything. I am really impressed and grateful for putting this great idea out to the public... I just can't wait to change my life and discipline myself a step at a time to accomplish what I've always wanted to do." - Vanessa C, backer of the original Esington glass. 
$100,000 free acoustic base has been unlocked!
Esington 2.0
Did you know the average worker gets interrupted after only 11 minutes of work? The crazy thing is it takes 25 minutes to get re-focused on the job. 
interruptions suck
With Esington 2.0, the magnetic time-stopper will keep your place in the sprint and act like a bookmark for your brain, waiting to be unleashed to restart your work.
Control Time
We invented a new way to control the time on your glass. Simply place the magnetic stopper over the neck of the glass and the timer stops!
a cool new magic trick - stop the flow of iron nanospheres with the silicone magnet
The magnetic stopper interrupts the flow of the solid iron nanospheres and keeps your place during your timeboxing sprint. 
About the Glass
Each glass is hand-blown borosilicate glass
For Esington 2.0, we are using borosilicate glass (like pyrex). Borosilicate glass is a type of glass that contains boron trioxide which allows for a very low coefficient of thermal expansion. This means it will not crack under extreme temperature changes like regular glass. It's a standard 25 minute timer designed for the Esington timeboxing method (similar to the pomodoro method with a few cue differences). 
4 million solid Iron nanospheres - more than 1 kilogram in each glass
For the timing medium, we are using solid Iron nanospheres. These work perfectly with the magnetic stopper since they are highly attracted to the embedded magnet. 
The most beautiful productivity timer ever made
The solid Iron nanospheres flow freely, even after thousands of magnetic stops. 
White Noise
Millions of solid iron nanospheres produce a soothing white noise for the first 20 seconds to act as a cue to start your work habit (more on this below).  Here's what it sounds like on different surfaces:  
PLAY

If we reach $100,000, we will also be including a ring that enhances the white noise effect:
PLAY

Magnetic Silicone Stopper
The silicone stopper is designed to have a unique feeling and a satisfying soft "click" into place to stop the timer. This will make it easy to engrain the "bookmark for your brain", and bring you back exactly to where you left off your work when you're ready to resume.
An elegant addition to any executive desk
While the stopper is in place, your brain senses incompletion and will subtly pull you back to your work. You will get a satisfying reward when you pull out the stopper and unlock the timer.
We tested the prototypes thousands of stops and they work perfectly every time.
The Esington Method
The Esington Method is a timeboxing technique that is similar to the popular pomodoro method, but with a few important cue differences.
Turn off all distractions
Turn over the glass to activate the 3 cues
Work on a single task until your time runs out
Soft Stop
The Esington timer has a “soft stop”.  There are no annoying bells or beeps to signal the end of your cycle.  
The timer runs out gracefully.
Sometimes, your focus can take you well beyond 25 minutes, and that’s ok (especially if working on lower-energy tasks like answering emails).  You don’t want to lose a valuable train of thought.  Just be sure to rest proportionally to the energy spent working.
Why You Need the Esington Glass
If you’re not using a timeboxing system, this is the perfect way to start. The Esington Glass is simple, beautiful and is built to last. 
If you’re currently using a timeboxing system, you need to upgrade your timer.  Esington is beautiful, elegant and unique.  What does your current timer say about you?
Esington 2.0 is the perfect gift for someone you care about.
The Design Process
We made a 3d mockup of the magnetic stopper and then hand-cut a sample out of silicone. 
After a few iterations, it worked perfectly with the iron nanospheres!
We used solid iron nanospheres to work better with the magnetic stopper. We also found the the solid iron nanospheres worked much better at flowing smoothly because of the smoothness and uniformity of the nanospheres.
Specifications
The Large glass is our executive edition: 40% larger and 3x bigger. The Large glass has louder white noise. Both are 25 minute timers. Borosilicate glass with 4 million iron nanospheres.

To show off your glass in an elegant way, we are including a free cork base with each glass. 
A cool cork base with each glass!
Timeline and Expectations
July: Early bird orders ship
August: Regular bird orders ship
We have the prototypes ready and have lined up a primary and secondary manufacturer. We have 4 years of experience making these glasses so we are confident we can deliver on time. 
The solid iron nanospheres have been tested thousands of times and we're also confident we can secure high quality material. We also have 4 years experience quality testing these glasses, so we're confident in getting you a great product in a timely fashion. 
Feedback from our first campaign
"I'm going to add to the growing list of glowing reviews. You not only delivered early but also the packaging was outstanding protection. The glasses themselves are even more impressive than I imagined from the photos and I am more than happy with them. You have also been great with your updates and keeping your backers informed. This is how a Kickstarter should be run and I look forward to any future projects from you. Thank you.” - A. Woodham III
“Just opened mine- I was out of town when it arrived. It's beautiful and beyond expectations! Bravo Rudy- like so many others have said, this was an all-time great KS. Can't wait to back your next venture!!“ - Sherri
Mine showed up, Berkeley, CA -- looks amazing, congrats Rudy on running the best run campaign I have seen yet. - M. Manfrin
Why Help Us?
At Esington, we believe that within each of us lies the untapped potential of a great person. A person worthy of leaving a long-lasting legacy.  Our goal is to give you the tools you need to untap that potential.
We have the prototypes you see here.  They have been working flawlessly for months. We are asking for your help to get us to the minimum order quantity from the manufacturer.  In exchange for your pledge, we’re offering the first run at a discount. 
Click the back this project button and help us make Esington 2.0 a reality. 
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 650+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $300MM raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We learned a lot from our first campaign over 4 years ago. In that campaign, the first manufacturing run was quick and efficient and provided a wonderful experience to about 1/3 of our backers. Unfortunately, we had delays for the 2nd and 3rd manufacturing runs which caused delays of up to several months for some unlucky backers. Since then, our manufacturing runs have become much larger and more efficient. Our QA process is refined and our logistics network has been built out in the last 4 years. We have employees overseeing every step of the process, rather than just Rudy handling everything :)

The iron nanospheres have been tested thousands of times and we're also confident we can secure high quality material. We also have 4 years experience quality testing these glasses, so we're confident in getting you a great product in a timely fashion.

The biggest risk is in an unexpectedly large and successful campaign, which could cause some delays if the manufacturing requirement is more than 20,000 glasses. It will take longer to manufacture and QA this large of a manufacturing run. We are confident we can deliver, but a very large order could cause delays.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content: Hi Esington backers,

Hello,
I just wanted to reassure everybody not to worry about updating their shipping details at this point - we will post a new project update when we are about to send the shipping surveys where you can do this. 
Some of the glasses & bases are still on their way; once they have arrived, we will get them packed & shipped. Keep an eye-out for our future updates as it won't be too long until you can finally enjoy your Esington 2.0 glasses!

campaign.story:
OGarden Smart can grow up to 90 fruits and veggies at once, so you can enjoy an abundance of super fresh food. Automatic watering makes using OGarden Smart virtually effortless, and the automatic low energy consumption LEDs simulate the perfect amount of sunlight, offering optimal year round growth.
Enjoy home grown produce whenever you need it. Be ready for simple, beautiful, and sustainable indoor gardening at its finest.
PLAY

Most indoor gardening systems lack the size and ability to grow a substantial amount of produce. Or they are difficult to set up, and leave even the most experienced gardener frustrated.
By being able to grow a great amount of veggies and fruits easily from your living room, OGarden Smart is a way to eat produce sustainably that’s never been done before.  Effortless, easy and pleasant, the OGarden Smart easily upgrades your home and your grocery basket!

No more worrying about which seasons to grow your produce in. No matter the conditions outside, OGarden Smart will grow up to 90 fruits and veggies at once, with 20 different kinds to choose from. 
Is your favorite vegetable or fruit not on the list? No problem! With the Bag of Virgin Earth, you can sprout your own seeds. Have fun and grow your own original plants. We'd love to see what you grow! Take photos of your harvest and share them with the Ogarden Smart community.
 All you need to do is plant a seed, make sure there is enough water in the tank (only once a week), and you can harvest your produce 30 to 40 days later, that’s it.
There are 90 available spots, so with a good rotation, you can have 2-4 large vegetables a day, every day. 
Alternatively, you can have a bouquet of various garnishes to top off any meal, any time.

According to the U.S. Department of Agriculture, it costs a family of four an average of $850 per month for groceries*. OGarden Smart can save you up to 80% on your veggie expenses - allowing you to cut down your grocery bill.
*Official USDA Food Plans: U.S. Average, November 2017
With OGarden, you can get fully grown, pesticide-free veggies for as low as $0.45 cents!
OGarden is truly the best way to eat produce grown in a 100% organic environment at a fraction of the cost.
Also, you’ll be eliminating food waste by being able to harvest food when you need it.
By producing your vegetables, fruits, and herbs directly at home, you know the quality of the air, the water and environment they grow in. Have peace of mind knowing that all of your fresh produce is grown in a 100% organic environment. 
Our seed pods are made with organic soil and feeds your plants with organic fertilizer, so you only get the best for your plants and for your body.
And of course, harvesting your produce only moments before eating it almost guarantees a better tasting product.

The beauty of OGarden (aside from the way it looks) is how it’s incredibly simple to use. Whether you’re an expert gardener or new to your green thumb, OGarden is the perfect system to grow beautiful produce. Gardening has never been easier.

Our unique system allows you to have 3 rotations of produce simultaneously. Germinate a batch of seeds, grow another batch to size, and have a third batch ready to harvest all at the same time!
Take pride in your food by producing your own veggies at home, in a fully automatic way.
OGarden Smart will automatically adjust watering for you to optimize growth. Just check your tank once a week and watch your garden grow.
If you do forget to check the water for a quick five minutes per week, don’t worry. OGarden Smart has a water warning system that will alert you when the water level becomes too low over time.
The rotating wheel keeps the roots and soil constantly moist with just the right amount of water, while keeping the the plants growing in an even manner.
OGarden Smart’s LEDs simulate the perfect amount of sunlight that your produce needs to thrive, and will automatically turn on and off for convenience and energy conservation. 
Best of all, they only take 120 watts of power! In comparison, that’s about 2 incandescent light bulbs.
Why is OGarden’s growth so efficient? And why is it so easy?
The key is in the cup of seeds. Made with organic soil and fed with all the organic fertilizer it needs, our seed cups create the perfect environment for the plant to grow.
They’re also super clean! No spilled dirt or fuss. With a 100% biodegradable membrane, the seed cups stay in place without any mess.
The OGarden Smart is so much more than a production machine - it’s a garden, bringing joy and beauty into your home.
We gave it a clean minimalist design that not only compliments, but enhances any space. 
The circular shape creates room for produce to grow larger and fuller while keeping small footprint in your living space. The cabinet underneath the wheel creates a perfect space to germinate your seeds. Grow a full garden indoors without using too much precious wall space, living space, or window light!
Plus, the rotating wheel creates a beautiful, moving aesthetic that brings life to your home.
OGarden teaches us how to grow our own food and gives us a better understanding of where our food comes from and how it affects us.
We see it as a way improve our health and quality of life through education and connection with food. 
We made OGarden effortless to use because we want the concept of growing food to be easily past down for generations. With OGarden, parents can teach their children the importance of growing their own food and pass down the pride and health benefits that come along with it. 
Eating healthy, fresh, and delicious foods will make an incredible difference in our lives. Growing our own food makes us mindful of what we’re putting in our bodies and connects us closer with our planet and with each other.
With OGarden, we are working towards bringing more autonomy to people through a solution that can have a significant impact on ecology. Our mission is to bring our humanity to a new level, with more responsibility for ourselves and our planet.
We are committed to creating true sustainable solutions that positively affect our world and our lives. Join us. Bring your life to a new level and let’s change the world together. 



Ogarden Smart production run
We created the OGarden Smart to work towards a better, healthier, ecological and responsible world. Our mission, through the OGarden, is to create a real positive ecological impact on Earth, while bringing more autonomy to individuals.
We decided to work on a solution that could bring us fresh and healthy food for cheaper than the store and as well creating a great and positive impact on Earth. We felt it would be our contribution to the improvement of Earth and humanity.
How can we get fresh, healthy, non-gmo vegetables, for cheaper than the store? That was THE question. We looked into other hydroponic solutions, but they only allowed us to grow a few herbs in the kitchen and did not really made a difference in our food expense. Everything we grew was gone in 1 to 2 meals.
So we started developing our own system that would make a REAL difference in our plate and food budget, and the OGarden was born. We created a super optimized device that grows up to 90 veggies, fruits, and herbs at the same time for about 5 times less expensive than in grocery store. 
Sustainable, autonomous, and affordable - welcome to the future of gardening!
OGarden is a young company based in Quebec, Canada. It was founded in 2016 after our first highly successful crowdfunding campaign. Lead by the vision of a more beautiful world that is ecologically closer to nature, the OGarden team has worked hard to find an innovative solution. We believe we've found it. Our goal is to bring more autonomy to you and your loved ones.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for Kickstarter and full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as the risks and our plan to assess them:

MANUFACTURING: The manufacturers are lined up, and we have quality assurance people on site during production. 

FULFILLMENT: Sometimes things get a bit crazy and stuff happens that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, customs clearance or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. We are using an experienced logistics team get our products to you. We’ll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where your product is and when it’s going to get to you.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
