campaign.story:
We need your help to launch XO Flo Mini, a new menstrual cup option designed for young people & those who need a slimmer fit. In January of this year, we released XO Flo to provide a new, updated option in the world of menstrual cups! Now it's time to make the Mini so we can provide comfortable, sustainable period protection for even more body types. This new size is perfect for people who typically prefer slim to regular tampons, are younger, or have never given birth.
As a thank you for backing our project and helping us make XO Flo Mini a reality, for every pre-order we'll be GIVING one XO Flo to our non-profit partner to distribute to those in need!
XO Flo Mini has a diameter of 41mm
Our Mini size transforms the special design features of the classic XO Flo into a smaller scale, providing a more comfortable size option for young people and others who need a slimmer fit. Our customers (whether newbies or seasoned menstrual cup users) rave about XO Flo's thoughtful design:
"Amazing! This solves ALL of my major complaints that I have with the previous brands of cups that I have used!"- Ambear, Colorado
"This cup is FANTASTIC! I've been using cups for nearly 20 years and so far, this one is the most comfortable." - Happymama8, Wisconsin
"I've used other cups for years, and after two cycles on the XO, I'm never going back... I've also had no leaks at all!" - jet, Connecticut
But we need your help to make this new size of XO Flo happen! With your support, we'll also be able to distribute thousands of menstrual cups to menstruators in need, through our non-profit partner Period: the Menstrual Movement. For EVERY XO Flo sold through this Kickstarter, we’ll GIVE one to someone who lacks access to safe, healthy menstrual products.
XO Flo Mini is a thoughtfully designed menstrual cup we created to be more comfortable for smaller bodies. If you prefer slim to regular tampons, this cup is for you! The Mini is also a perfect fit for young people or teens, light flow, and those with a low cervix or sensitive bladder. 
Despite its small size, the XO Flo Mini has approximately double the capacity of a tampon and can be worn for up to 12 hours at a time. Made with medical grade silicone, it won't over-absorb or over-dry like a tampon can, and won't leave fibers behind in the vaginal canal. With proper usage and care, your cup can last up to 10 years!
DESIGNED FOR COMFORT: Unique inner support rings help your XO Flo open fully to prevent leaks. Its comfortable internal rim and smooth design make for easier insertion and removal. XO Flo's flexible stem may be trimmed, but it's so comfortable you probably won't need to!
HIGH CAPACITY: XO Flo Mini holds over 30ml; a tampon holds 15 ml or less, depending on the size. XO Flo can be worn for up to 12 hours at a time!
RESPONSIBLY MADE: XO Flo is proudly made in the USA with high-quality, medical-grade silicone.
ZERO WASTE: Each XO Flo replaces 240 tampons per year, or 2,400 in its lifetime! Imagine no trash for 10 years--and no ongoing manufacturing waste from the creation, packaging, and shipping of thousands of tampons.
SAVE MONEY: According to Jezebel, you're spending about $120 per year on disposable period products. XO Flo costs $35 (or less if you pre-order through this Kickstarter!) and can last for up to 10 years, saving you over $1,000!
GIVE BACK: For every XO Flo ordered through this Kickstarter campaign, we'll give one to someone in need through our non-profit partner, Period.
XO Flo & cotton storage pouch
We're so excited to work with Period: the Menstrual Movement to distribute XO Flo to menstruators in need! Period distributes free menstrual supplies to people struggling with homelessness, poverty, or domestic violence. Since 2014, they've provided products for over 160,000 periods!
XO Flo is a sustainable option for menstrual care, as it don't need to be re-purchased on a monthly basis. Each XO Flo can take care of 120 periods and replaces thousands of tampons!
XO Flo & packaging
Every XO Flo comes with detailed instructions and its own cotton storage pouch. When ordered through this Kickstarter, your XO Flo or XO Flo Mini (your choice!) will be delivered in its beautiful box with metallic foil accents.
We worked with Murmur Creative, a Portland design company, to develop XO Flo's unique branding and packaging. For XO Flo Mini, we'll enlist the help of the fabulous designers at Murmur once again to create packaging that reflects the luxurious, bold design of our menstrual cup.
"In a market where feminine hygiene products try to blend in as much as possible, XO Flo stands out." - The Dieline
More rewards:
Show your period pride with a Uterus Love Pin measuring 1" round.
Pledge at the Cloth Pantyliner Kit levels and receive 5 GladRags Color Pantyliners, a GladRags carry bag, mesh laundry bag, and the best-ever stain remover stick made by Buncha Farmers. 
Receive a limited edition Tote Bag featuring the cute menstrual cup love icon on XO Flo's packaging!
*Limited Reward* -  "A Cup in the Hand" or "Cup Comet" enamel pins from our friends at Put A Cup In it.
"A Cup in the Hand" Enamel Pin
"Cup Comet" Enamel Pin
XO Flo is made by injecting medical-grade silicone into a stainless steel mold. After the XO Flo Mini mold is tooled to our exact specifications by skilled engineers, we'll continue to use the same mold for years to produce the XO Flo Mini.
There's no two ways about it: creating the mold for such a precise product is just plain costly. We're SUPER proud that XO Flo is made in the United States, and we're asking for your help so that we can afford to make XO Flo Mini here in the USA, too.
We work with a family-owned company in California that's been in business for over 30 years, and they're as picky about quality as we are. In fact, they specialize in molding precision parts for medical equipment and aircrafts. The manufacturing of XO Flo? Basically rocket science!
At GladRags, we (Meagan & Tracy) have been helping menstruators choose reusable menstrual products every day for years. Across thousands of customer conversations and personally testing the wide world of reusable menstrual care, we've pooled our accumulated period knowledge to create something new and unique: XO Flo & XO Flo Mini!
Meagan Brockway is the menstrual cup master of our team. Her eye for design and personal experience with a wide variety of menstrual cups lends XO Flo its innovative features and beautiful design. Meagan has three small dogs that often join us in the office, despite their lack of menstrual cup knowledge.
Tracy Puhl is the owner of GladRags and has personally used reusable menstrual products for over 10 years. Her passion for making a difference led to our partnership with Period, and she works hard to ensure that we always find new and innovative ways to use business as a force for good.
The two of us first worked together at a non-profit years ago, where we recognized a special spark in one another which would inevitably lead to collaboration. Others noticed too, and we were affectionately dubbed "the dynamic duo!" Together, Meagan & Tracy are Lady Business, a partner company inextricably paired with GladRags. This dynamic duo spends their days together at GladRags, where XO Flo was born following lots of research and many after-hours conversations envisioning the ideal menstrual cup!
GladRags is a small business with big ideas: to make cloth pads and menstrual cups go mainstream and empower menstruators everywhere. From our office in Portland, Oregon, we ship comfortable, thoughtfully-designed reusable menstrual products to customers all over the world. Our menstrual cup, XO Flo, and full range of cloth pad styles provide menstruators of all types with body-friendly, versatile options that they can rely on for years.
GladRags champions period positivity by displacing disgust and disposability with celebration and reusability. By reinforcing that menstruation is normal and educating the community about reusables, we erode the myth that periods should be shamed and hidden. As a result, reusables have rapidly shifted from “alternative menstrual hygiene” to an option that’s increasingly being embraced by the mainstream, particularly as the benefits like cost savings, concern for the earth, and the desire for a more comfortable period are being heralded by a growing GladRags online community.
GladRags is proud to be a certified Benefit Corporation since 2012. As a woman-owned company that insists on a sustainable approach to business, we use local bike delivery to receive finished goods from our local sewing partner, pay meticulous attention to supply chain and waste reduction, and put our company values of environmentalism, inclusivity, and body positivity into the very heart of the GladRags brand.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There's always the potential for a delay in manufacturing due to factors outside of our control. We experienced this with the classic size of XO Flo, when we needed to have the mold fine-tuned to create a pristine finish. While delays are no fun, we're confident in our ability to weather them as a team in our quest to bring XO Flo Mini into the world! And we've added in some cushions into our timeline just in case!

Our dream is to make both sizes of XO Flo accessible to all. Through our partnership with Period, we'll bring menstrual cups to homeless, low-income, and other marginalized populations. Of course, not all of these individuals have the desire or access to resources (such as clean water or a private bathroom) necessary for proper use of XO Flo. To ensure that all of the menstrual cups provided are actually used, Period works with service providers such as shelters and delivers reusable products in conjunction with education on how to use them. We'll continue to work with Period to monitor the effectiveness of giving reusable products to menstruators in need.

To make XO Flo accessible to all, we'll also continue working to get our menstrual cup on the shelves at brick and mortar stores across the USA. We've been working hard to provide education to store buyers who may not be aware these types of products even exist! With the successful funding of this Kickstarter, we'll be able to help stores provide an additional option to their customers.

We know we will always face challenges from fears and outdated ideas about periods. We believe the solution is to keep the conversation going and to raise the profile of safe, sustainable menstrual products that honor the natural processes of our bodies. By supporting this Kickstarter, you're also helping create a positive conversation about menstruation. THANK YOU!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: All rewards have shipped (last call for survey responses)! Requesting reviews & your feedback
updates.update_content:
Hello backers!
We're a couple of weeks out from shipping the last bulk of rewards, so we wanted to check in to see how you're liking the XO Flo Mini. After fulfilling all of your rewards, the cup was put up for sale on GladRags.com and can now be purchased by anybody. If you'd like to help customers make an informed menstrual cup decision, we'd greatly appreciate you submitting an honest review of the cup once you've had a chance to try it. As always, we're happy to provide assistance in troubleshooting menstrual cup use, feel free to get in touch with us here or at hello@gladrags.com!
If you haven't yet received your rewards because you haven't filled out your survey, or you have been contacted by us via message and haven't responded with your shipping information, this is your last call! We need your response before the end of the month so that we can wrap up this Kickstarter. After all of these updates, we're going to be closing the books at the end of September, so you've got until then to claim your rewards.

updates.update_userinfo: Minis have ARRIVED. Shipment of remaining rewards this weekend!
updates.update_content:
Nearing the finish line...
The day we've been waiting for has finally arrived! All of the XO Flo Mini for backers and their donations are in the office, being counted at this very moment. If you are waiting for your rewards to be shipped, you will receive an email with a tracking link over the holiday weekend as we'll be prepping all remaining rewards for shipment Saturday, September 1st and Tuesday, September 4th. We'll be making drop-offs to the post office Saturday and Tuesday due to the holiday closure on Monday.

Hey there, backers!
We are so pleased to share that we've approved samples of XO Flo Mini from our manufacturers. It looks flawless and is perfectly fit to our specifications, so we've given the go-ahead to begin production on your reward fulfillments (and beyond)! 
Here it is, side by side with big sibling, XO Flo:

updates.update_userinfo: Mold manufacturing completed -- Next steps & a peek at packaging!
updates.update_content:
Hello, friends & backers!
The magical day we have been waiting for has arrived: the mold tooling is completed and we have received the very first samples of XO Flo Mini. This is the step at which we see the molded pieces of XO Flo mini for the very first time (well, since 3D printed prototyping -- though that happened way back in 2016!). Any final refinements would need to be sorted out at this time, or if the cups are good then we would go into production.

updates.update_userinfo: Mold tooling news + a sneak peek
updates.update_content:
Hi there, backers!
This is the month we anticipated the XO Flo Mini's arrival when mapping out our timeline, and we planned for some wiggle room knowing the lead times for manufacturing the molds and cups as well as having experience in bringing the original XO Flo into the world.
We have just been informed that the toolmaker of our original XO Flo molds is unable to create the tooling for the Mini which is unfortunate to hear so far into the process. It's certainly been a lesson in even further anticipating the unexpected! Thankfully, we have our wonderful manufacturers in California who are just as anxious to see the process move along so they can start to supply the Mini to us -- per their recommendation, we will be moving forward with another toolmaker to complete the XO Flo Mini mold. We already have a relationship with them due to their work in refining the original XO Flo mold, so we are pleased to have them take over this task.

It’s been a few months since the close of our Kickstarter campaign, and we have a few updates for you:
MOM’s Organic Market now stocks XO Flo! We love this values-driven grocery chain, and hope you’ll stop in next time you need to pick up some GladRags or a menstrual cup.
We are currently fine-tuning the mold to ensure the XO Flo Mini is the best menstrual cup we can possibly produce! We are working with our manufacturer and designer to adjust the thinnest portion of the Mini’s stem to ensure its integrity throughout the lifespan of the product. Things are moving along slowly but surely and we thank you for your patience during the most labor-intensive and technical portion of the manufacturing process!

updates.update_userinfo: Surveys & Updates on XO Flo Mini
updates.update_content:
It’s been just over a month since our campaign wrapped up, and we’ve been busily working on the next steps to bring XO Flo Mini to life! Earlier this week, we sent out surveys to all of our backers. Thank you to everyone who has already filled out their survey—this is super helpful, and means we can ship your rewards as soon as possible!  
We recently received the funds from Kickstarter, and were able to put down our deposit for the creation of the mold for the new XO Flo Mini. We’re working with our manufacturer now to get that process rolling (it can take 6 to 12 weeks to complete) and we’ll let you know once we’ve received word that the mold is complete!

campaign.story:
Sence: The Evolution of Mindfulness and Productivity
Sence contains an unbelievable technological breakthrough that is capable of giving you more emotional insight than ever before so you can be your most productive, caring and happy.
  But, how the heck can a wearable be used to track emotions?
Sence can track emotions by very closely listening to your heart beat. Every emotion causes your heart to beat in a slightly different way. Think about how differently your heart beats when you are in a rage versus when you are in a calm state of serene happiness.
These, tiny changes in the heart rate are untraceable with traditional wearables. Sence uses revolutionary technology that allows it to track these differences using ECG (aka EKG) signals. ECG analysis is 250 times more precise that existing fitness trackers and smart watches and Sence is the first to release a technology that can measure ECG from one wrist. With this unprecedented level of accuracy it is not surprising people are calling Sence a “breakthrough”.
Sence’s insights can give you more data about your wellbeing than ever before. Sence can track precisely when and where you experience:
By applying this data, Sence can help you:
  Sence can recognize the minute variations in between your heart’s contractions. Using ECG (also known as EKG) tracking technology. Sence is the first wearable to be able to track ECG from one wrist which allows it to take readings all day and collect the data it needs to train you on how to maximize your happiness and reduce your sadness.
  SenceHub’s powerful algorithms turn the raw data provided by SenceBand into actionable analytics. Using SenceHub you’ll be able to:
 1. Track your stress, vitality and emotions so you can adjust your daily routine to maximize happiness and productivity.
2. Track your daily physical activity, steps, heart rate and vitality levels. Now you'll finally know what time of day is YOUR best to pump iron or go for a run by understanding how your vitality naturally ebbs and flows.
  3. Get notifications when something interesting recently happened with your own emotional states or to those of someone in your network. This will help you understand the kind of support you can offer whether it be giving them their space, going to cheer them up or anywhere in between.
    Sence can be used in different ways and it will bring many benefits depending on your goals:
  Help decide a part of SenceBand's fate by voting for your favorite color in the public comments. You can vote for one of our suggestions above or come up with your own. But remember, only votes posted in the public comment section will be tallied so let's get the conversation going!
 SenceHub: Your Beacon for Self-Mastery
With each ECG scan, SenceHub syncs up with your calendar and takes a snapshot of your location so you know exactly when and where the scan was taken. This gives you maximum insight into the origins of each emotion so you can identify patterns and course correct.
  With SenceBand’s unprecedented precision and accuracy it has the functionality to extract some of your body’s most valuable information. Use it to best understand your body and mind in ways you never thought possible. You can also share it with your friends and family to stay in tune and connected to the well being of those you love.
   SenceBand: With its R-peak tracking technology, SenceBand collects high-resolution data from your heart. SenceBand has: 
  Sence’s mobile app, SenceHub, contains sophisticated algorithms that analyze the data provided by SenceBand and presents them to you in exquisite detail. SenceHub features:
Although ALL the SenceHub features described in this campaign are free, we will provide each backer with a free 1-month premium plan subscription as well. This unlocks access to even more features that we are currently developing to give you even deeper insight into your life. Consider this just one way of us saying "thank you" for supporting us on our journey. The amount of premium features unlocked will depend on the amount we raise so don't forget to share this campaign to help unlock even more premium features!
   Customer Service Specialist 1
Customer Service Specialist 2
Few people realize, but many traditional fitness tracking wearables use outdated technologies such as optical sensors that end up only being about 70% accuracy in measuring your heart’s activities.
The bottom line is that these sensors track pulse waves, which are phenomena caused by the heart beat but which also have many other, unrelated factors that effect their frequency. Besides, you can track your pulse with your own finger! Why pick a device that tracks a phenomenon you can track yourself? Sence tracks something fundamentally different and dramatically more precise: electrocardiography (ECG)
Now you can see why Sence is able to track data that is so much more accurate than what's out there. Curious about how Sence can track ECG from just one wrist or how it uses that data to tell you what emotions you've experienced? Keep on reading!
There are two main pillars to understanding how the science behind Sence works:
1. How SenceBand can accurately measure ECG signals from one wrist
2. How SenceHub can turn those raw ECG signals into emotional insights
Once you understand both these concepts you'll really grasp why Sence is so revolutionary! Let's take a look at both these pillars individually.
SenceBand's ECG Tracking from One Wrist
SenceBand measures ECG using a patent-pending technology that allows it to cancel out the electromagnetic "noise" from your body. This mechanism filters out things like electrical signals from muscle contractions and leaves only the electromagnetic feed from your heart (ECG) . This filtering method is completely novel and makes SenceBand the only smart bracelet capable of measure ECG from one wrist.
How accurate is Sence? Below is the result of a test that was done that compared Sence to a standard, medical-grade ECG device. You'll see that the R-peaks (the critical phenomena to understanding true heart-rate and emotions) match up perfectly with the medical grade control.
But don't take our word for it! Check out our SenceBand prototype in action for yourself in the uncut demo videos below. We made them to show SenceBand's current prototype functionality so there are no doubts we are well on our way to a final product:
Video 1: Sence's ECG Signal
Video 2: Sence Tracking Emotions
Feel free to skip to 3:25 for the test results if you wish!
Getting Emotions from ECG Analysis
Okay, so now you understand how SenceBand tracks ECG signals from just one wrist, but how can this help to infer anything about emotions? Aren't emotions all about what is going on in your brain? What does the heart have to do with emotions? Actually, there is an intimate link between the brain and heart. In fact, the heart's nervous system even contains 40,000 neurons!
Your heart rate is determined by the two competing systems in the body: The sympathetic and the parasympathetic nervous systems. The sympathetic nervous system is known as the "fight or flight" pathway and it tries to pull your heart in a direction of excitement. The parasympathetic nervous system is known as the "rest and digest" pathway and tries to mellow your heart out and slow down its beats. All our emotions leave a unique footprint in this constant battle between sympathetic and parasympathetic control. These footprints can be read using heart rate variability (HRV) analysis of ECG data. Since Sence accurately tracks R-peaks it can identify the unique signals associated with each emotion.
 How Many Emotions can Sence Track?
With Sence's unique ability to analyze heart rate variability, it can track 64 different emotions and bodily states in you and your loved ones. Specifically, Sence can track 2 flavours (intensity levels) of each of the 32 emotions found below in Plutchik's Wheel of Emotions, a standard emotional reference tool in medicine and psychology:
Don't get overwhelmed with all these emotions! Sence lets you pick the emotions to track that matter most to you and your lifestyle. The insight you glean from Sence can be as specific or broad as you want it to be.
Further Scientific Reading:
Want to dig deeper into the Science behind Sence? Click on any of the topics below to be linked to a peer-reviewed scientific article that covers it in detail:
Capturing Emotions in Real Time using Heart Rate
The Connection Between the Brain and Heart for Emotions
HRV Analysis for Stress
Tracking Vitality Using HRV
How Tracking the Heart can Pinpoint Emotions
The Heart’s Connection to the Nervous System
Testing Emotional Responses to Social Situations with HRV
HRV’s Ability to Differentiate Similar Emotions
   Customer Service Specialist 1
Customer Service Specialist 2
Sence allows people to share their analytics with others, at a level of privacy they see fit. You'll be able to let people know if you had a generally good or bad day or even show them exactly what emotions you felt and where. This allows people using Sence become connected in ways never before possible, without even needing to be in the same room (or even country)!
Sence for Couples 
Sence allows you understand not only your own emotions but those of that special someone. Know when to give them space or when they need a little pick me up! Be the best partner you can be with these revolutionary emotional insights.
Sence for Families 
Track the health and emotional wellbeing of the more sensitive members of your family such as children so you can keep them safe and sound. With Sence you can get the insight you need to be the best parent or caregiver you can be.
Sence for Friends 
With Sence you can get way more insight into your peer group than with a social media post. Are The Boys feeling a bit down lately as a group? Maybe it’s time to go out for a night on the town! Sence connects you to your friends in ways that go way beyond words, pictures or even videos to make you feel more connected then ever before.
The Sence story features a long and winding journey with an unlikely origin. Originally, the Sence team assembled not to build a revolutionary hardware device but to collect high quality ECG screening data. With this data, they build a huge database that they hoped to sell to others. In order to acquire this data the Sence team set out with the monumental goal of screening 20,000 patients in rural Ukraine with a mobile hospital made up of 24 doctors, 24 nurses and modern ECG equipment. They planned to provide free check-ups and health guidance to these individuals who had little access to healthcare in exchange for their anonymous ECG data.
Sound like an impossible task? The Sence team actually exceeded expectations and comprehensively screened 22,433 patients in 52 days. This unprecedented study got Planexta (the makers of Sence) many adulations worldwide from cardiac societies and the like.
Planexta Inc. is officially recognized to have performed the largest cardio screening ever to test for 260 parameters in under 52 days by a National records society.
With the massive amount data Planexta now had, they set out to find the right wearable technology company to sell it to. Unfortunately, they didn’t find a good fit! All the current devices either didn’t use rigorous enough ECG measurements to make use of the data or they measured ECG in such an impractical way that users would never take enough readings for the data to be useable.
What a waste! So much data was now available but there was no wearable sophisticated enough to use it. Instead of giving up, the Sence team decided to take it upon themselves to create (from scratch) an ECG measuring wearable that was both accurate and extremely practical for consumers to use. They created a lab dedicated to this task called Platform20k (as a memento of the monumental screening tour) and hired 13 top experimental physicists and engineers, the begin work on SenceBand.
It took the team over a year to succeed, but SenceBand became a reality due to the discovery and implementation of a whole new method of measuring ECG. Now, Sence has the hardware and the software foundations to do something truly revolutionary. However, Sence is still a scrappy little company and genuinely needs YOUR help to actualize the immense potential Sence technology has to improve people's lives. The Sence team thanks you for every last dollar of support!
  SenceBand’s design was created by the famous Red Dot Award winner, Donn Koh and his Singaporean team at Stuck Design. Before helping to create SenceBand he worked on multiple projects for Microsoft, Dell, Samsung, HTC and T-Mobile. Our engineers and physicists worked closely with Donn Koh’s team to ensure technological prowess and aesthetics could co-exist in SenceBand’s unmistakable appearance. Check out Sence's visual journey below:
                                                                                                    This project was developed and is being managed by BeyondNature, a company specializing in launching innovative products through crowdfunding and transitioning them into mass-market powerhouses.
      Customer Service Specialist 1
Customer Service Specialist 2
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have an international and seasoned team with top professionals from big pharma companies such as Pfizer, Merck, Novartis and Genzyme. However, in this instance we are still a startup and even our formidable experience does not make us immune to the nearly inevitable ebbs and flows that come with launching and fulfilling a successful crowdfunding campaign. Although we will use every ounce of our experience to ensure each aspect of our campaign and fulfillment is approached efficiently and professionally and that we are 100% transparent with our backers along the way, the following risks are absolutely worth considering when backing this campaign:

Supply Chain Risk

Although our manufacturers and product developers have extensive experience with other high-tech projects, they have not manufactured SenceBand itself yet. Any new product has the potential to have delays in the first go around as unexpected hurdles present themselves. That being said, we have attempted to build these unforeseen delays into our project timelines above by adding in a significant buffer from our current delivery timeline estimations. We'd much rather deliver unexpectedly early than be time-crunched to meet our project deadline.

Product Registration and Licensing Risks

Although SenceBand contains clinical-grade ECG technology, we are not using it to diagnose or treat any medical conditions. This makes product registration a relatively straightforward process in most places in the world. Especially for a bunch of ex-pharma guys like us who have had to go through the medical drug registration process. That being said, we are not experts with global regulatory requirements with this particular product and there is a slight possibility ensuring this device is properly registered in your country could cause a delay to fulfillment. We will do our utmost due, diligence to make sure no delays occur in this area but we are obliged to make all our backers know that they are indeed a possibility.

Other Risks

There are likely a ton of mini-risks that we haven't yet considered for the project but discovering them and overcoming them will be part of the fun we have together. Our main objective is to make this project successful as efficiently as possible and keep everyone in the loop with diligent communication and an open dialogue with our backers.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Hi backers,  
The Planexta team is working hard to bring SenceBand to life but we would like to take some time to let you know about our manufacturing progress so far.  
We have successfully completed the electronics manufacturing which is great, however the manufacturing of Sence casing has seen another technical challenge. We have designed the casing to be small and lightweight, which is the main reason for one of the technical issues. When the main casing and strap are being casted together, the thinner parts of the plastic begin to undergo temperature deformation, or “melt”. Kindly take a look at the photo below so you can see to what we are referring.

campaign.story:
THANK YOU to everyone who contributed.
Keep following us at circumcisionmovie.com
-------
Circumcision is the most common surgery in America.
It affects sex, politics, religion, children, medicine, culture - all in the most personal way possible. Yet America is the only industrialized country that routinely practices infant circumcision for non-religious reasons - and we have never had a national conversation about it.
American Circumcision will start the conversation our culture needs to have about circumcision.
I have been working on this film for over five years, dedicating a sigificant amount of my own time and money to the project. I've taken the film as far as I can go on my own, and now, we need your help.
The film is already shot. Right now, we are in post-production, and quickly approaching the stage where we need to hire other professionals for sound editing, color correction, music, graphics, etc. - all of which costs money.
We've set a goal that will allow us to finish the film, but every contribution beyond that will allow us to reach more people with this movie.
To help start a conversation about this issue, please pledge any amount you can and share this kickstarter with as may people as possible. Every contribution or share helps.
Brendon Marotta
Director of American Circumcision
Director Brendon Marotta hanging out with an interview subject's kids at Genital Integrity Awareness Week in Washington, DC.
Follow & spread the word on social media:

support.title: OBI Supporters
support.descp: Pledge $1 or more and we'll name a fish after you. Pledge $5 or more and we'll name a school (of fish) after you. This applies only to our aquaponic greenhouse tilapia.

support.title: Beta Access
support.descp: Receive weekly status updates with video blog of progress + Honorable mention on the Kickstarter Supporters page on the OBI website.

support.title: Celebrate!
support.descp: If you support us at the $10 level, we will put you on our Hall of Fame page, where you get to respond to the question: "What motivated you to support the Open Building Institute Kickstarter?" This will happen right after we achieve our funding goal. We will Tweet this so we can all bask in victory in front of 10,000 followers. This will also help us rouse interest in our upcoming September and November 2016 builds.

support.title: Spread the Word and Stick it to the Man
support.descp: Who doesn't want to stick it to the man? To facilitate this, we will send you 4 stickers that you can display proudly on your laptop: 2 OBI stickers and 2 OSE stickers. You will also get the reward from the Celebrate tier.

support.title: The OBI Building Book
support.descp: This will be an early release of a deluxe e-book containing complete documentation of the Starter Home—a 700 sq ft expandable house, loaded with ecological features - costing $25k in materials, and buildable in 5 days (using our extreme-build techniques). The documentation included in the book also covers the Aquaponic Greenhouse addition. See description in the text.

support.title: Living Home Webinar
support.descp: What does the most ecological and regenerative house look like? Find out in this webinar, featuring the co-founder of the Living Building Challenge - Bob Berkebile. We will glean what it takes to apply the Living Building standard to the OBI advanced home.

support.title: Aquaponic Greenhouse Webinar
support.descp: Did you ever think it would be a good idea to build an aquaponic greenhouse that provides you with all the fish and vegetables that you can eat? Learn how to design the aquapoinic greenhouse - based on the learnings from our first year of operation.

support.title: Select Webinar Package
support.descp: We will offer a number of webinars related to affordable eco-housing - from design and software, to code compliance, off-grid housing, to construction techniques, machines, utilities, and others. This package allows you to select from any of these offerings, including the Aquaponic Greenhouse and Living Home Webinar. We will run these webinars starting August 2016, and continue throughout 2017 as we approach the build of the Living Building Challenge home.

support.title: Gratitute Package
support.descp: Get Beta Access + The OBI Building Book e-book + 2 OSE and 2 OBI stickers + A personal video thank-you-message from the co-Founders, which includes the answer to a question of your choice.

support.title: Get Involved
support.descp: This reward is for those who want to contribute designs for consideration in our 2016 build. It includes the Spread the Word and Stick it to the Man package, and the House Design Webinar, where we teach you the ins and outs of using the OBI design system to create buildable designs. Simply download our structural modules, followed by downloading all the Starter Home Eco Feature modules - and design a house that meets criteria of the OBI Design Challenge for the November 2016 build of the Starter Home.

support.title: Back It
support.descp: Back the project on your own back with a limited edition Open Building Institute T-shirt. Includes OBI Building Book Package + 4 OSE and 4 OBI stickers.

support.title: Hard Copy - OBI Building Book
support.descp: New Reward! We have heard a number of backers request a hard copy (printed version) of the OBI Building Book. So here we are offering a beautiful coffee table book featuring the Seed Eco-Home and Aquaponic Greenhouse. The book is designed to inform and inspire. Includes autograph by Catarina and Marcin - destined to be a collector's item. Add $10 if you also want to receive the OBI Building Book e-book. Add $4 for 2 OBI stickers + 2 OSE stickers.

support.title: Studio Model Kit
support.descp: New! The Studio Kit allows you to build a scale model to reveal how the OBI construction method works. The kit lets you fold the wall, door, window, and roof modules out of paper stock - add magnets to them - and then snap them together to make a technically-correct model of the OBI Studio (see picture in text). This kit can also be used for rapid prototyping. This is great for children as well as for real house design. We plan to use the kit ourselves for modeling. We will produce the kit with OSE's open source laser cutter and 3D printer. Add $3 for 2 OBI stickers + 2 OSE stickers.

support.title: House Design: Crash Course Video
support.descp: This will be the early release of a quality-content, tightly edited video crash course that takes the budding designer through all the steps of designig a house completely open source tool chain. This covers architecture, software, video production, rendering, part design, BIM, embedding of 3D viewable images in websites, and using Kdenlive, GIMP, Inkscape, and Natron for making a presentation on a building design. We will span content from foundation and structure calculations, to hints on effective design of interface details using the OBI modules, to designing interior furniture for importing into Sweet Home 3D, to using FreeCAD for Building Information Modeling (BIM), as well as generating floor plans, and up to landscaping the site with edible and biologically sound design. We will survey the critical points of code compliance for meeting local and global regulations with best practice. We will include rendering quality scenes in Blender. This will be a super-tight video edit of resources compiled for rapid learning from a wide range of sources. You will get early access to this video as beta testers of the content, prior to a general release to the public at a later time. Approximate length of video will be 30 minutes, so it will be a real crash course. This reward also includes the Spread the Word package.

support.title: Direct Pipeline Package
support.descp: Do you want to build a home, greenhouse, tractor, or another crazy project, but not sure where to start? If you support us now, we will personaly help with any of your questions in a private Hangouts session. Talk to either of the project co-founders. You can also find out all that you ever wanted to know about OBI, OSE, machines, or changing the world. 45 minute session.

support.title: Materialize!
support.descp: Introduction survey course. One day tour and Short Course on materials production held at the OBI headquarters in the Kansas City area. Includes Eco-Brick, Lumber, and Insulation Production using the Open Source Materials Production Facility. For those who would like to produce their own building materials or offer them for sale. Includes demonstration on burning limestone (a local quarry material). We will also cover polycarbonate multiwall glazing production, bioinsulation production, and paint production. This is an introduction to local production of building materials, and how to start a local materials enterprise.

support.title: House Build Mini Course
support.descp: Did you ever wonder what building your own house is like? Here, you have a chance to participate in designing and building the OBI house system - by building a small studio - and a choice of several other building modules. This is a 1 day short course. You can choose from a number of the building modules included in the Seed Eco Home. Multiple workshops like this will be offered to help people get started on the OBI system - if they do not have time for a full 5 day build. Each workshop will have a theme - such as building materials, energy, water, efficiency. off-grid, waste system, heating, aquaponics, and others. The first will be offered in October 2016, and we will offer more until July, 2018 - with new technologies as they are developed. Later systems include home-scale solar hydrogen, closed loop water systems, and a 16 kW wind turbine.

support.title: Enlightenment Package
support.descp: This is a package for people interested in rapid learning. It includes access to up to 10 of the webinars that we are offering, in which we enlighten you with practical knowledge related to building the most ecological housing possible. This also includes House Design: Crash Course Video package. This is for those people who want to understand at a deeper level - what it takes to build regenerative construction. The webinars will begin in August 2016, and run throughout 2017 as we approach the Living Building Challenge compliant home.

support.title: Tri-State Fiesta Package
support.descp: If you live in Missouri, Iowa, or Nebraska - you are lucky. We are offering a group dinner with the Founders at a favorite restaurant in Kansas City, Des Moines, or Omaha. Limit of 18 people in each city, and one dinner is included. Join a candid conversation on any topic of regenerative development. Includes a presentation on the work of OBI and OSE.

support.title: CEB Machine Build
support.descp: 2 Day Extreme Manufacturing Workshop - where you and a team build the CEB press from scratch. Experience Extreme Manufacturing hands on in our September build of the CEB press in Missouri. Includes mechanical, hydraulic, and controller systems. First day includes crash courses in welding and fabrication.

support.title: Solar Power Cube Build
support.descp: The solar powered Materials Production Facility will include hydraulic power generated by solar energy. We will do an immersion 2 day build workshop where we build a hydraulic power source that runs on solar panels to power the machines of the Materials Production Facility.

support.title: 360 Degree Backhoe Build
support.descp: This is an experimental 3 day workshop where you build a 360 degree pivoting backhoe using OSE's modular design system. This is based on 3 prior builds of the backhoe, where we are now reaching for a low cost, high performance model. First prototype will be 36 horsepower.

support.title: The International Package
support.descp: First workshop in Europe. This is our first workshop in outside the borders of the USA - in Belgium. We will be building a set of scalable 3D printers, where you choose the size of the machine that you build. If you want to take the machine home with you, that will cost an estimated $300-700 more, depending on the size of the machine that you build.

support.title: Materialize+
support.descp: 2 day event, includes the Materialize! package. Then you will have to bring your pickup truck or trailer - and take home with you a pallet (about 200 block, weighing 3000 lb) of stabilized CEBs that you can use for your own home improvement project. You get to participate in this production process with your sweat equity.

support.title: Seed Home Build
support.descp: Participate hands-on in a 5 day build of the Starter Home at the OBI headquarters. You will experience the swarm build model first-hand, and walk away with an integrated experience with all the features that are included in the Seed Home. The first build will be in November 2016, and several more will occur after July, 2017.

support.title: Aquaponic Greenhouse Build
support.descp: Participate hands-on in a 5 day build of the 800 square foot Auaponic Greenhouse at the OBI headquarters. You will experience the swarm build model first-hand, and walk away with an integrated experience regarding fish, vertical growing systems, duckweed, azolla, and worm rearing for fish/chicken food, mushroom growing, and microgreens/sprouts growing. We are building on the first prototype of the Aquaponic Greenhouse from 2015 to build a small scale food production system that can either be used to feed a family, or yield $2k/month of revenue - from an 800 square foot area using a community supported agriculture model. First workshop will be in Nov. 2016, and there will be more after July of 2017.

support.title: Eco Multipurpose Tractor Build
support.descp: Eco Tractor Design and Build - a 6 day short course where we build a working eco-tractor from scratch. A tracked machine for use in construction and agriculture. Build includes an 18 hp power cube, solar power cube, and a tracked Autonomous GPS Arduino unit for autonomous operation. This model can run in slow motion on solar power, or be fueled by charcoal and an 18 hp Power Cube with gasifier. Cost is ~$5k in materials. This tractor can be used to do garden work, lift heavy objects in construction, or run your chicken and pig tractors autonomously in your perennial agriculture landscape. We are aiming for the world's first practical charcoal-fueled tractor that can be used not only by hobbyists - but by real producers. This will be the first prototype, built on our experience with power cube, tracks, universal rotors, hydraulics, and structural modules. This is for the eco-equipment fanatic. (does not include taking the machine home with you)

support.title: Power Cube Build
support.descp: This is a 2 day Extreme Manufacturing build of an 18 hp power cube - OSE's universal hydraulic power unit. It can be used to power tractors, brick presses, or any hudraulic equipment, with appoximately 9 gallon per minute hydraulic fluid flow. You put in your sweat equity to build the power cube with a team - and then you take the Power Cube home with you. You have to bring a pickup truck or a trailer - as shipping is not included. This is a limited time and quantity offer for the first 3 days of the workshop.

support.title: Diehard Package
support.descp: Do you want to learn to build a house, aquaponic greenhouse, brick press, tractor, or your own solar hydrogen system? This is just a sample of all that you can experience. Select and attend any workshops of your choosing from the 20 or so workshops that will be offered from Sept. 2016 to July 2018. And attend any of the webinars being offered in this Kickstarer in the same period. Totally unlimited access to you - and you are allowed to bring one other person or family member with you to any of the workshops.

support.title: Brick Press
support.descp: Attend the 2 day CEB Machine Build - and take a working CEB Press Basic Model home with you, see description in the text. You will need a tractor and a hydraulic power source, which are not included. You will need to come with a pickup truck or trailer to take the machine - weighing 1600 lb - home with you.

support.title: Studio Build
support.descp: The OSE team will help you organize and build your own eco dream house up to 700 sqft. We'll help you source the materials, plan and organize the build at your location. Contact for details.

support.title: Aquaponic Greenhouse Build
support.descp: The OBI team will help you organize and build your own Aquaponic Greenhouse of up to 800 sq ft, including all the biological systems. You get an integrated ecosystem like you see in our pictures, plus improvements that we are making during the past year of operation. We'll help you source the materials, plan and organize the build at your location. Contact for details.

support.title: The OBI Building Book
support.descp: This will be an early release of a deluxe e-book containing complete documentation of the Starter Home—a 700 sq ft expandable house, loaded with ecological features - costing $25k in materials, and buildable in 5 days (using our extreme-build techniques). The documentation included in the book also covers the Aquaponic Greenhouse addition. See description in the text.

support.title: Co-Housing Package
support.descp: Interested in a co-housing project? Did you know that 80% of projects fail in the USA? OBI helps you to put your project on a good track with a 1hr skype session with Dr. Matthieu Lietaert, consultant for co-housing projects and co-founder of one. Plus, he will send you a digital copy of his short film "Voices of Cohousing" with ideas and tips from pioneer cohousing projects in Scandinavia.

updates.update_userinfo: We Are Training House Builders Now
updates.update_content:
Friends,
We have come far since 2016, and are now training builders for the Seed Eco-Home 2. This is the next iteration, the first 1000 square foot model of many models that we are releasing starting 2021. We are offering a 14 day crash course on the build:

updates.update_userinfo: Seed Eco-Home 2: Next Iteration is Ready for Pre-Orders
updates.update_content:
Dear Supporters, 
Life after COVID - and we're back to the Seed Eco-Home more fresh than ever. We are glad to announce: you can now pre-order an actual home  - a 1000 square foot model buildable with 2 people in one week, or a turnkey product that we build for you. USA only this year, but expanding worldwide next year. We are also releasing much more than the OBI Building Book which we finished half way last time. It will be expanded to about 1000 pages of build and enterprise info - as we relase an open enterprise around the Seed Eco-Home as well. This is a mouthful - so please read our last newsletter below.  It covers our next Summer of Extreme Design-Build - and how you can build our Seed Eco-Home 2 model - or get it built for you.

updates.update_userinfo: Happy New Year, and Exciting Plans for 2020
updates.update_content:
Happy New Year. 
Next summer - 2020 we will be moving forward on much of the construction work - and will be publishing a manual that you all can  likely benefit from. We are holding an entire 3 month Summer of Extreme Design-Build (Summer X). We'll be moving the state of art forward quite a bit as we begin 3D printing the types of construction panels that go into the Seed Eco-Home! That will be a major step, as we just started producing our 3D printers for sale, and we are scaling them up next year to produce full-sized, 4x8 foot construction panels. And, we will be using waste plastic as the feedstock for making 3D printing filament. Check out some of the schedule in the last link.

Dear Backers,
We are continuing our builds in early 2020 - this time with a Compressed Earth Block version of the Seed Eco-Home. We call this the CEED Eco-Home - for Compressed Earth Ecological Dwelling. We are doing our first international build - in tropical Belize in Central America. We have  a collaborator in Belize who built our CEB press, and we are collaborating to build a MicoHouse for a community member in need - in the fishing village of Copper Bank, Belize.
Happy new year from snowy Missouri at the Seed Eco-Home:

Happy holidays from the Open Building Institute's Seed Eco-Home. This is what the finished product looks like after much hard work. This is our showcase model, and we will open it up for public tours next year.

We are glad to announce that we have officially finished the Seed Eco-Home - v1.0. It was a long haul since the Seed Eco-Home workshop of November 2016 - of course things take much longer than you think when it's the first iteration. There was a lot of experimetal trial and error throughout.
We will publish glamour shots of the interior on December 24 - and over the next 5 weeks, we are publishing walk-through videos of the PV System, Hydronic Heating System, Biodigester, and the Water Purification System. In this post, we cover the PV System.

project_data.project_name: Open Building Institute: Eco-Building Toolkit

campaign.story:
The Main Street Entrepreneur is a full length feature documentary detailing the choices made by ordinary people that have led to extraordinary outcomes, each building livelihoods doing what they love. Motivated and driven by personal aspirations, these individuals dared to take risks in pursuit of their dreams. Their journeys and the experiences they share will inspire and motivate you to choose a similar path, a path inviting you to follow your own dreams and live a life of fulfillment.
        Mike and Jay Glauser have been interviewing entrepreneurs together, as father and son, for 6 years now.  During the summer of 2014, with a team of 4, they embarked on a 4,000 mile bicycle adventure traveling from the west coast of Oregon to the east coast of Virginia.  As technology replaces jobs, their mission was to interview 100 small town entrepreneurs in 100 cities to see how everyday Americans have found success doing what they love, where they want to live. 
With no shortage of coverage in the media highlighting big corporations and successful multi mullion dollar tech companies, the smaller successful individuals and businesses in America are often overshadowed and overlooked.  Not everyone can create the next Facebook or Google or eBay, but everyone can create businesses that fill needs in their communities. 
The people they met and the stories of success they heard during their two month long journey along Main Street America is a something that they want to share with the world. 
A book written by team member Dr. Mike Glauser titled "Main Street Entrepreneur" was recently released which details their cross country adventure as well as shares the keys to success that are being implemented by the entrepreneurs they interviewed. With so many inspiring stories and examples that each of us can learn from, the team wants to take this project one step further and release a full length feature documentary.   
  We've had the opportunity of interviewing hundreds of entrepreneurs in different industries all across America, getting an intimate look into their lives and their stories.  We’ve interviewed everyone from local blacksmiths, to coffee shop owners, to entrepreneurs who own biogas engineering plants, clothing and apparel businesses, waste management companies, and urban farming supply stores.
As diverse as these businesses are, we've found that their stories of success are very similar. The fear, uncertainty, struggles and setbacks that each of them have faced with starting a new venture and the perseverance to get to where they are today is something that each of us can learn from. 
The following entrepreneurs are just a few of the hundreds that we've been able to interview
 Marshall Miller - GoPro Bomb Squad
Marshall is a world-class paraglider pilot, ski BASE jumper, and PRO-rated skydiver. He travels the world in search of new and unique places to take to the skies. He picked up a paraglider for the first time in 1999 and discovered his life’s purpose: flying. As an aerial enthusiast with an infectious obsession with the sky, Marshall was determined to find a way to make a living with both feet off the ground. In 2008 he and several friends struck a deal with GoPro and cofounded the GoPro Bomb Squad allowing them to travel the world.
David Toledo & Caleb Light - Power Practical
How would it be if you were in the backcountry and your mp3 player had continual juice or you were able to charge other electronics whenever you wanted? Meet Power Practical, a company that created a product called the Power Pot that uses heat to charge usb devices. Just add water to the Power Pot, place it on a heat source and within seconds you can have your phone charging. 
 In order to get the funding for their initial product, Power Practical launched a Kickstarter campaign that was successfully funded.  Since then, they have done an additional five other Kickstarter campaigns raising over $1.5 million. The producers of Shark Tank took note of their success and revolutionary product line and invited them to appear on the show where David and Caleb were able to land a deal with Mark Cuban who gave them $250,000 for 12 percent of the company. These young entrepreneurs show us that anybody can build a wildly successful business with a good idea that is properly executed.
Tonya Montalvo - Intervention Group
Tonya grew up feeling like a protector to her siblings.  In her twenties, she got into private security as a dare.  Proving her doubters wrong, her first patrol car was a used cab, which she bought for $200, and her first contract was with a local KFC.  She is now the founder, a.k.a. "Chief", of Intervention Group, a private security firm based out of Oakland, CA.  She currently has more than 20 employees and over 500 contracts around the Bay Area.
Justin Gold - Justin's Nut-Butter
Justin is a pioneer in the natural food industry. He started making homemade nut butters with a food processor in his home kitchen in 2004. His unique blends of peanut butter and natural flavorings were a huge hit at the Farmers Market in Boulder, Colorado. Today, Justin’s products are sold across North America and internationally in fine retailers including Whole Foods Market, Kroger, Safeway, Cost Plus World Market, HEB, Super Target, and Jewel-Osco. Justin is committed to making the finest organic and all-natural nut butters and peanut butter cups on the planet.
 Nicole Campos - Bling Inc.
Nicole started selling purses and jewelry out of her basement with no idea her business would take off the way that it did.  Within six months she opened her first store.  She now has multiple retail locations throughout Kansas and sells products online.
Dan & Suzanne Marino - Jackson Hole Buffalo Meat Co.
From a young age, Dan Marino always wanted to live in Jackson Hole, Wyoming. The day after he graduated from high school he packed up his 1966 Mustang, drove to Jackson Hole and he's been there ever since. Dan and his wife Suzanne are the third owners of Jackson Hole Buffalo company and took the business from a local stage to a national one. Their company specializes in different cuts and preparation of buffalo and elk meat which they ship all over the nation. They are a perfect example of individuals creating a lifestyle for themselves, doing something they love in a place they love.
Chris Washburn - Fezzari Bicycles
Imagine leaving behind a successful career in corporate America in pursuit of finding greater satisfaction doing something you truly love! That's exactly what Chris Washburn did when he created Fezzari Bicycles. High demands of work travel causing him to miss out on family events and a desire to create and do something on his own is what led to this life-changing decision. Fezzari Bicycles is no ordinary bike shop. It's much more than that. Based on three important principles, the company offers 100% customized products to provide every user a perfect fit, guarantees top of the line quality that competes with any high-end bike manufacturer, and deals directly with the consumer to offer the best prices. Chris's story is a testament that greater happiness comes when you're doing something you are passionate about.
In order to understand our motivation behind this project and why we want to share it with you, it's important to talk about a few key points.
  Small businesses play a vital role in our economy, they are the engines of job creation. There are 28 million of them in America and they provide 55% of all jobs, employing over 56 million people.
These businesses account for 54% of all US sales.  Whether it's a local floral shop, or a small restaurant or bookstore, they contribute to local economies by bringing growth and innovation to the community in which the business is established. Main Street Businesses truly are the backbone of the economy.
Experts are projecting that nearly half of our occupations will become obsolete due to new technology and that four out of five of us will experience significant periods of unemployment during our careers. We don't want to sound like alarmists, but there is a huge employment shift on the horizon and we need to be ready to know how to handle it. 
According to a recent Gallup pole, 2/3 of US employees are unengaged with their work. In other words, they aren't happy working jobs that take up 38% of their time during the week. When you don't like doing something, dedicating an hour to it is torture, let alone 40 hours per week!
Small businesses and entrepreneurship are key to the success and growth of our economy. The jobs that they create help to replace the ones that are lost to automation and small business owners around the country are spending their work week doing what they love. By sharing the success stories of dozens of these everyday Americans, we hope to educate, inspire, and motivate others to take control of their lives and spend their time doing something they love through entrepreneurship.
We are excited to offer a variety of rewards that will teach, motivate, and help you to become a Main Street Entrepreneur and part of the #MainStreetMovement. We have something for everyone, rewards for rookie entrepreneurs looking to get started all the way up to serial entrepreneurs who have already made their mark on Main Street. Take a look at the reward tiers below and let us know if there are other things that you would like to see offered.
    T-shirts offered in 4 different colors
  Click here to see what people are saying about Dr. Glauser's book
  Check out the Training Program content by clicking here
       MIKE GLAUSER
Mike should be renamed “Mr. Entrepreneur.” He has built successful ventures in the retail, wholesale, consulting and educational industries. He has consulted with hundreds of startup companies and large corporations. Mike has written two previous top selling books on entrepreneurship: Glorious Accidents and The Business of Heart. Earlier in his career he toured Europe in a band and recorded an album on vinyl, which his kids call “that big black CD thing.” Mike is currently the Executive Director of the Clark Center for Entrepreneurship in the Jon M. Huntsman School of Business at Utah State University. When he is not in his office, he is riding his bike in the spectacular mountains of Utah, playing a mean banjo, reading books, hanging out with his wife Mary, and eating sushi with his five sons.
   JAY GLAUSER
Jay is our creative genius. His passions are videography and music. He has filmed more than 100 successful entrepreneurs around the world to create training programs and dozens of short videos about how people are making a living.  He also has broad experience with new ventures in the music industry. Having planned, promoted and managed hundreds of concerts across the United States, Jay is no stranger to fun. He is a founding member of two national touring bands and has created, marketed, and sold thousands of event-related products. He has extensive experience with street teams, radio, print, and social media. When Jay is not creating films, he is playing music, traveling, working on his house with his fiancé, Jael, and hanging with friends.
     ANDY THUNELL
Andy also has a passion for film which has recently taken him to places like Guatemala and Peru. He made his debut in the world of entrepreneurship as a small business owner when he turned a passion into an opportunity to earn income. As an avid whitewater kayaker himself, Andy saw a need and high interest for instruction and in 2009, Rapid Progression Kayak School was born. Over the years he has had many unique opportunities broadening his experience in business. These opportunities range from managing and creating a YouTube sensation working with a blind pianist, to founding a social entrepreneurship venture in the highlands of Guatemala.  Andy works at the Jeffery D. Clark Center for Entrepreneurship in the Jon M. Huntsman School of Business at Utah State University.  He can also be found with his wife and two boys, traveling, eating out, and of course kayaking.
  In order to get our project to it's current phase, we've pooled together our own personal resources. We've spent thousands of dollars and thousands of hours traveling, interviewing and getting content for the documentary. Although we are close, there is still a considerable amount of work to be done which will still cost a good chunk of money. Your support of this project will help us do the following in order to get Main Street Entrepreneur to the finish line as a polished finish product, ready to share with you and the rest of the world:
Additional Filming
Storyboarding & planning 
Post production 
Assistant Editing
Music licensing
Legal fees
Travel
Research
Marketing and promotion 
Film festival registration fees
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our team is comprised of individuals who have experience working with and running successful crowdfunding campaigns. We know the amount of work that goes into a project and that one of the most important things to you as a backer is the timely delivery of the promised rewards. We take great pride in our work and realize that without your help and support this project would not be possible.

With that said, this is our first time putting together a full length feature documentary. It is going to be a huge undertaking but we feel confident that we can deliver you a superb final product with the team that we have in place. Not only do we have a stellar team, we also have an incredible support network of mentors who have been involved in projects of this nature and will be there to offer us insight and help along the way. We understand that there may be some unforeseen setbacks that we haven't anticipated and if anything happens to slow down our progress, we will be 100% transparent with you and constantly keep you updated.

Thanks again for your support, this would not be possible without each and every one of you. This documentary and its message is something that we can't wait to share with you and others all over the world.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hey all!  I wanted to check in and let you know the post production is going very well.  I have been cutting up the footage of almost 50 interviews since we got home from the summer trip and we are also still out and about collecting awesome stories.  
You may remember our good friend Marshall Miller who is the founder of the GoPro Bomb Squad.  On Monday we were able to take a helicopter up over Utah State University and Marshall decided to find his own way down.  I threw this little clip together for you.  Hope you are all doing well.  Don't hesitate to shoot me a message if you have any questions.
Jay

updates.update_userinfo: Jumping out of helicopters for a living.
updates.update_content:
Words can't express how thankful I am to each and everyone of you out there supporting this project.  We have had an amazing summer filming this documentary and I can't wait to share the footage we captured.  Thanks to all of you, it's time to get to work bringing it all to life!  
In the meantime, I will keep you updated with the progress and we will be working to get you all your rewards as soon as possible.

Hey everyone!  We have had an INCREDIBLE couple weeks so far out on the east coast interviewing entrepreneurs and experts for this documentary.  I can't wait to share it with you.  The content has been everything we could have hoped for and more (more on this below).
We are coming down to the wire so please spread the word to all your family and friends who may be interested in supporting the film!

Hey everyone!  We have been all over the west coast for the last couple weeks and things are going incredibly well so far!   We have had some amazing interviews with entrepreneurs who have created businesses doing what they are truly passionate about, experts who are giving us some great insight into the future of work in America, and we've even been talking to everyday people on the streets sharing their dreams of the future. Below are just a few pictures of some of the incredible people we have been chatting with.  Many more to come.  Thank you all so much for all the love, support and messages so far!  Please let me know if you have any questions or if there is anything I can do for any of you.  - Jay

Hey everyone!  Day one of the Kickstarter has been amazing! I am sitting here in my hotel room in Seattle, WA after a day of filming and I am so thrilled to have you all along for this ride.  
Today we interviewed Connie Bourassa-Shaw, Director of the University of Washington Buerk Center for Entrepreneurship and tomorrow morning we are off to film Molly Moon Neitzel, founder of Molly Moon's Homemade Ice Cream.  We stopped in last night and the line was down the street for well over three hours. That stuff is amazing!  Then it's on to Baker City, OR to chat with the Chaves family!

project_data.project_name: The Main Street Entrepreneur - Documentary

campaign.story:
To enhance our performance, move faster and go farther, man has invented a lot of special kinds of footwear: rollerblades, cycling shoes, cleats, climbing shoes, heavy-duty hiking boots etc. But all too often this footwear is so specialized that we are forced to sacrifice on comfort, convenience, and even safety. To overcome the limits, where footwear starts to be a burden rather than a benefit, we developed Skinners – ultraportable footwear for every adventure.
Revolutionary adhesive-free technology
Turn on the audio! You will thank us later :))
PLAY

FITNESS, YOGA – Socks, flip-flops, running shoes. Skinners disrupt this trinity of gym footwear and combine the advantages of each – the freedom of a sock, the great grip and the basic protection of shoes.
TRAVELLING – That 10-hour flight or bus ride can be tough on your feet – trapped in shoes simply because you can’t take them off due to the cold, dirty ground or embarrassing odor.
CAMPING, HIKING – Those 4-pounds boots got the job done on that 20-mile hike but now it’s time to take off those heavy casts and give your feet a rest. Skinners let you move around the campground without getting dirty, wet or stung.
RUNNING, ATHLETICS – Enrich your training on natural or soft surfaces and activate all your foot muscles and tendons. Skinners simulates the barefoot experience and forces your feet to adapt to the terrain. A strong athlete starts with strong feet.
OFFICE – We love your fashionable high-heels and Oxfords :). But usually 6 hours out of 8 at the air-conditioned office you are hiding them under the desk. And to be honest, because of comfort it's possible they end up next to your cold, dirty ground touching feet. Don't risk getting cold and tune up your work performance with Skinners! 
ROLLER BLADING – Getting to the bike path, descending hills or getting over other obstacles in the way can be tough. But who wants to spend the whole ride with a sweaty back from carrying their spare shoes around?
SIMPLY ANYWHERE… take Skinners on your next walk with your dog, use them around the house or just at home. Take them to a beach-volleyball game, slackline, yoga session or wherever you want. The possibilities are endless…
Sizes and colors will be requested in a survey sent after the campaign
10k - EARLY DELIVERY - production starts when we hit this goal :)
50k - PROTECTIVE POUCHE - for each pair of Skinners
150k - DISCOUNT - for backers in our online store after campaign
Less has never been more
Just like da Vinci, we believe that your foot has all the technology you need. We invented Skinners to keep this masterpiece effectively protected and at the same time support all of the amazing things it can already do.
Skinners are handmade in the heart of Europe and are produced without harming people, animals or the environment (vegan and barefoot friendly).
WHY KICKSTARTER
The new production technology costs est. 16 000 USD and the costs regarding basic certification and patenting reach up to 4 000 USD. That makes 20 000 USD in total.
We were able to put half of the money up front from our own pockets, but we still need additional 10 000 USD. That's why we ask you, our backers, to help us make our dream possible.
Interested in writing about us and our mission? Then download our press kit, feel free to email us directly at hello@skinners.cc or leave us a message if you have any other questions.
Please remember, Skinners provide basic protection to your feet and are not a full-time substitute for regular footwear. Proper and reasonable use is strictly advised.
Patent-pending technology, patent-pending design.
Thank you for backing us :)
This project is promoted by Jellop, a direct­ response online advertising agency specializing in Kickstarter campaigns on Facebook Ads and Google AdWords.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Even though we've planned the heck out of these things, producing a top-quality product is a big mission. That's why we spent more than a year prototyping, fine-tuning the manufacturing process and eliminating possible risks and defects. 
 We did a few smaller production runs to make sure everything is good to go (and it is!), so right now we are frontloaded with the first 1,000 pairs of Skinners that we personally made for the fastest among you. All this from a professional team ready to do its best to deliver the best quality rewards on time. We are thrilled to be able to share the joy of Skinners with you :)
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

project_data.project_name: SKINNERS: Revolutionary Ultraportable Footwear with Silver

campaign.story:
We’re Back with More!
After a successful debut on Kickstarter of our original design project--TubShroom®-- we’re back with our second creation called SinkShroom™, which is made specifically to protect your sink drain. 
   Thanks to more than 2,000 original Kickstarter and almost 2,000 IndieGoGo In-demand backers, our original invention came to life. TubShroom® is now the #1 best-seller in the category on Amazon and on its way to the retail channels across the nation. TubShroom® is now protecting drains in over 75,000 homes! And the number of the loyal "Shroom" fans is growing each day. 
The product reviews have been phenomenal and many of you had asked for the same simple solution for your bathroom sink drains. Well, we listened, and now we present to you the one and only... SinkShroom™.
Meet the new SinkShroom™
  We have tested the SinkShroom™ vigorously. And yes, it does a great job catching hair, jewelry and anything in-between, while the water continues to flow freely. 
And the best part is that for the price of just a couple of bottles of Dran-o or Liquid Plumr, you are getting a solution that will prevent clogs and last for many years.  
SinkShroom™ is ready to serve and protect :)
SinkShroom™ is based on the same revolutionary concept as TubShroom®. It goes inside the drain, stopping hair, jewelry and other undesired objects from going down the drain preventing nasty and hard to deal with clogs. It’s designed to fit any standard bathroom sink that is 1.25” in diameter. It comes in the same colors to match your TubShroom® plus we're adding a new color – Silver/Gray to match the chrome/stainless steel appliances. You will be able to pick the color of your choice in the survey that will be sent to you at the end of the campaign. 
Both SinkShroom™ and TubShroom® are patent-pending. We feel confident that our winning designs can become the standard in bathroom drain protection around the world, eliminating the need for harmful chemical cleaners or costly plumber visits. We've set out to make the planet--and your wallet--greener than it would be otherwise. 
Installation and Maintenance Illustration
Installation literally takes seconds and when it comes to performance, SinkShroom™ is second to none.  If your sink is equipped with a stopper, it can easily be removed. Just loosen the screw located below the sink and pull out the stopper. 
SinkShroom™ in Action
For such a small product, the benefits are numerous. If you've tried other drain protectors or hair strainers already, you know how much room there is for improvement in this space. SinkShroom™ gets it right every time. 
For those of you that missed our first campaign and haven’t had a chance to enjoy the benefits of a TubShroom®, we offer SinkShroom™ + TubShroom® combos. 
And here's how the original TubShroom® works...
TubShroom® in Action
  TubShroom®
  Cleanup is fast and extremely easy!
Combos packs are available in this campaign.  
TubShroom® and SinkShroom®
Here're some of the recent Amazon reviews of the TubShroom®:
  We would like to thank all our new and existing backers as well as Kickstarter for making our first project possible and look forward to another successful campaign. Thank you! 
     -
Get your project funded today!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As is the case with any product, shipping and manufacturing delays are always a possibility. We are committed to adhering strictly to our timelines and getting the SinkShroom™ produced on schedule. We gave ourselves a couple of weeks of extra time just in case there's an unexpected delay. Should everything go as planned we will actually deliver earlier than promised.

Throughout the research and development process, we’ve experimented with many different designs in order to develop the perfect strainer. After an extensive process, we have created a functional prototype to our design specifications, which will help expedite the production process once SinkShroom™ reaches its funding goal.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
