updates.update_userinfo: STRO and SPORQ Just Launched! Available for Pre-Order on Kickstarter
updates.update_content: JUST LAUNCHED! You can now order right here on Kickstarter. It's time to say goodbye to single-use plastic straws and cutlery.

updates.update_userinfo: Whoa! STRO and SPORQ from the makers of... TubShroom?
updates.update_content: Yup! You heard right. The folks that brought you the award-winning, multi-million unit selling Tubshroom drain protector (launched first on crowdfunding platforms, by the way) are back at it with the all-new reusable STRO and SPORQ products. Pre-orders start on November 23rd, 2020 right here on Kickstarter. It's time to put an end to single-use plastics in all their forms. Straws, spoons, forks, knives, whatever. Enough is enough. Society and governments alike are coming to the realization that the vast majority of plastics used on a daily basis are made in such a way that they practically last forever in landfills or--worse yet--our oceans. We're talking about billions of single-use plastics tossed in the trash on a yearly basis! We have to do better.

updates.update_userinfo: Clog-Free Drains Just One Click Away -- ShowerShroom Ultra Just Released on Amazon!
updates.update_content:
ShowerShroom Ultra Now Available
For those waiting on the sidelines, now is the perfect time to get our most advanced drain protector ever with the ShowerShroom Ultra for your stand-up shower stall drains. Simply remove your drain cover and replace it with the ShowerShroom and you'll be living clog-free for quite some time. No more annoying clogs or costly plumber visits. With nearly 3,000 backers supporting the launch of ShowerShroom Ultra to the tune of $95,000+ on crowdfunding platforms to date, we were able to quickly bring this iteration of our 'Shroom family of products to market. Grab one today on Amazon right .

updates.update_userinfo: Less than 52 Hours Left to Go! Pre-Order ShowerShroom Ultra
updates.update_content:
Time is Running Out!
The patent-pending ShowerShroom® Ultra borrows from much of the same technology found in our original TubShroom®. To provide superior protection to every drain in the home, we knew we had to tackle the shower next. Ask yourself the following questions: How many strainers have I gone through in the past couple of years? How easy is it to clean my current strainer? Is my current strainer an eye sore? Does the water continue to back up every time I take a shower? How much do I dislike putting my hands on disgusting clumps of wet hair? We addressed all these concerns.

Maybe it's time for an... upgrade?
Closely following the release of the highly-anticipated Tubshroom Ultra comes our all-new, much improved SinkShroom Ultra for your bathroom sink drains. The SinkShroom Ultra is a stainless steel, hair-catching machine that won't let those pesky hairs get through so you won't have to worry about clogged drains again.

updates.update_userinfo: Have a Shroom Laugh and More...
updates.update_content:
Have a Shroom Laugh and More... 
Sometimes the best medicine is a good ole chuckle. And what better way to convey a message than through comics? Cleaning clogged drains with chemical cleaners is like dropping an M-80 onto a weed to get rid of it. You do more harm than good in the long run. We always say that prevention is the best medicine. And, most importantly, no one wants to die... (click for higher res):

The Shroom's Are Multiplying! Grab a Kitchen SinkShroom Today!  
It's true what they say... you can't keep a good Shroom down. To all our loyal backers from the very beginning with the revolutionary TubShroom just a few short years ago, we say thank you for all your ongoing support all these years. We couldn't have reached where we are without you all!

campaign.story:
Our Kickstarter campaign has ended but you can still get yours from our website.
Smoovie is a video stabiliser that fits in your pocket, is easy to use for all abilities and the most affordable option for recording smooth video on the go!
Our revolutionary design means Smoovie is significantly lighter and more compact than other video stabilisers. We’re excited because professional looking video is now simple, compact and affordable enough for everyone!
Take it anywhere and everywhere, and when inspiration strikes you'll have it to record great video to keep and share forever. Use Smoovie at home, on the go or on your next adventure!
Here's how using Smoovie compares to handheld.
Traditional video stabilisers are much bigger and heavier, with tricky and time consuming set up. Instead of relying on weight and friction Smoovie cleverly uses magnetic force, allowing anyone to record smooth video without all that bulk.
PLAY

Be more creative with you video! Here's what we shot in a day in London. (No post stabilisation)  
We've made Smoovie really simple easy to set up. Just pull out the telescopic counterweight balance to the marker for your smartphone or GoPro, and Smoovie calibrates itself! Aaand action!
Be more creative with your shots! The handle is adjustable so you can get the shots you want. Get up high or go down low!
Plus with a more natural handgrip there's no more holding your smartphone at odd angles so no more wrist ache!
The patent-pending gimbal design uses two lightweight but super strong neodymium magnets. This magnetic attraction is what keeps shots steady by reducing the shaking created when you walk or move. Go where you like and record fantastic looking smooth videos!
Compact size 19cm x 4cm x 3.5cm (and extends up to 11cm).

Weight 125 grams (4.4 oz), that's less than a Big Mac!
Holds All popular Apple, Android and Windows smartphones up to 86mm in width and 225 grams in weight. Plus all GoPro models with Smoovie Plus.
Materials Two strong neodymium N42 magnets, durable ABS and acetal plastic body, protective TPE rubber pads and long-lasting stainless steel telescopic tubes.
It's not quite as good as the large, heavy and expensive equipment that professionals use. But we're excited about Smoovie because it's affordable, easy for everyone and can be taken everywhere. When inspiration strikes, you'll have it! 
For GoPro users you can capture all of the action with Smoovie Plus. With the Smoovie Plus option you'll get Smoovie for smartphones with an additional interchangeable adapter to use with your GoPro tripod mount.
Back us today and help us go into production. Not only will you get yours by June but to say thanks you'll get Smoovie and Smoovie Plus at the lowest special Kickstarter prices. 
Estimated RRP is £19.99 for Smoovie and £21.99 for Smoovie Plus. 
After five months of development and four rounds of rapid prototyping using 3d printing, machining and duplication techniques, our design has been tested in different scenarios and we’re really pleased with the outcome. Currently the design is going through a final iteration to refine the aesthetics so that Smoovie looks and feels great too. 
In January this year Alex travelled to China to discuss the manufacture of the Smoovie project with factories the team had long term relationships with already. After comparing the quality of prototypes produced and manufacturing processes, a selection was made.
We are confident that the manufacturer we have chosen is best suited to help us get Smoovie ready for mass production so that we can deliver a product that satisfies our requirements and more importantly that you'll be happy with.
We are an experienced team based in London and HK who have designed, developed and delivered products  on a global scale. We know how to bring innovative ideas to life and take them to market. 
Our product designer Alex Kalogroulis has worked on many innovational designs. In his early years he worked alongside British Inventor Sir Clive Sinclair on the award-winning A-Bike which is displayed in London’s Design Museum. Alex has also led design on other products like Sea Scooters and Smart Touch kitchen gadgets. He also teaches future designers on the Innovation Design Engineering master’s course at London’s Royal College of Art. 
We're so excited to see what you'll do with Smoovie. Let's keep in touch, join us on Twitter and Facebook. 
Your contribution matters so so much. We can only make this happen with your help. If we don't reach our goal we won't be able to go into production. Please help us share Smoovie with your friends so that we can make Smoovie together!
                                        If you like us and want to share about Smoovie here's our press kit. We like you too!
Need anything else or just want to chat? Please email alex@pocketsmoovie.com
This project is promoted by Jellop, a direct­ response online advertising agency specializing in Kickstarter campaigns on Facebook Ads and Google AdWords.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
With years of experience our team really understand industrial design, working with manufacturers to get it right and delivering product all over the world.

We've already spent a lot of time prototyping, testing and refining Smoovie to get it right for you. Working closely with our manufacturer to continuously learn and improve from prototype to production our aim is to work quickly with them so that you get your Smoovie on time. 

We've been conservative with our timeline and accounted for short delays that may arise. As with all products being mass produced for the first time we know that sometimes unforeseen scenarios can occur. Should this happen we promise our backers that we will do everything and work hard to deliver on spec and as quickly as possible.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Smoovie will be with you soon!
updates.update_content:
Production is complete and we’re currently packing the final Smoovies before sending to our fulfilment centre this week. From there Smoovie orders will then be shipped all over the world in batches. To find out when you can expect yours here are our estimated arrival dates for Smoovie:
China 1-3 August 
Hong Kong 4-6 August
US + Canada 11-13 August
EU 12-15 August
ROW 16-18 August

We're excited to let you know our product designer Alex has arrived back from a successful trip to the factory. Here’s a little update from him on how well his visit went!
“Pilot production had been completed ready for my arrival and I personally checked all units for defects. Any issues were addressed by a very cooperative manufacturing team and the pilot production repeated and improved until units passed a strict quality control standard. This process was completed within 48 hours before we gave the green light for production to go ahead.”

Today we have shared our survey with all our amazing backers. Please share your details with us and we'll work on shipping them out to you safely and as quickly as possible. 
We can now confirm that final assembly of the Smoovie will begin in early July with completion due by 10 July. Alex and the Smoovie team will be overseeing this in China to help make sure Smoovie is made to the specifications and quality we are happy with. Once checked and packed, orders will be shipped to Hong Kong before being sent out to customers via Hong Kong Post airmail.

The Kickstarter community have really helped us get this far and we're excited to have such a successfully funded project! We just wanted to take some time to show some Kickstarter love and share about a few of our friends. We think you'll like them too!
 The Magic Coin Pouch | Takes the ‘pain’ out of carrying loose change.

Great news! There's been such amazing support for Smoovie that we've been able to develop and test a wonderful new feature. It's an idea that came from our Kickstarter backers so a huge thanks going out to the community!

updates.update_userinfo: New feature! Now you can capture even more with Smoovie!

project_data.project_name: Smoovie - Super steady video for your smartphone and GoPro.

campaign.story:
We hit our stretch goal of $350,000!!! 
Thank you! EVERY BACKER who pledged $60 or more will receive a Kickstarter Exclusive Artist Prayer 5x7 in. laminated card!
NEW STRECH Reward!!
If we can hit $375K in the next final minutes EVERY BACKER who pledged 60 or more will get a Universal Mind Lattice Prayer card!
NEW ADD-ON!!
For the last day of our campaign we are releasing this Kickstarter Exclusive 8 x 10 in. Wall Plaque as an $85 add on. Please include $15 for US shipments/ $25 international.
"There is no loftier mission than to approach the Godhead nearer than other people, and to disseminate the divine rays among humanity." -- Beethoven
This drawing by Alex Grey is the frontispiece of his acclaimed volume, The Mission of Art. "Beethoven" is available now for the first time as a rare limited edition fine art etching. Only 40 of these exquisite prints will ever be available. Exclusive for this Kickstarter campaign only until May 31st.
Image size: 9x12 in. Paper size: 11x14 in.
Etching on archival paper; Hand-pulled from a copper plate
Edition size: 40, signed by the artist. $400USD
If you would like to add this to your pledge, please email john.harris@cosm.org to check availability. 
Film by Shay Motion 
  Imagine visiting Entheon where precious paintings, drawings, sculpture and moving images resonate with your highest states of consciousness. Entheon will exhibit the finest works of the Visionary Art movement, including Alex Grey's acclaimed Sacred Mirrors.
Entheon's 3-Story Side
Become a part of this historic project to create a home for Visionary Culture. Your support will help complete the interior exhibition spaces and begin the extraordinary sculptural countenance of Entheon.
Net of Being, Installation view by Taryn Moosmon
     First Floor of Entheon
The Entheon Portal features Alex's relief sculpture, Creating a Better World, to be cast in bronze. The doors show Adam and Eve returning to the Garden, making a new world by their artistry and harvesting the Tree of Wisdom.
Entheon Portal
Then, enter MAGI Gallery, exhibiting original artwork by leading masters of the International Visionary Art Movement. Each visitor will get to spin the World Prayer Wheel at the reception desk. The Entheon Museum Shop will include affordable originals, limited editions, books and posters of the genre. Check out the unique and exclusive rewards offered by some of the world's finest Visionary Artists who join us in this campaign.
MAGI Gallery - Current Progress
A shrine in Entheon will be dedicated to Alex's artistic collaboration with Grammy Award winning band, Tool. The Psychedelic Reliquary will host treasured artifacts and ephemera, including the spectacles of Dr. Albert Hofmann and the ashes of Timothy Leary. A bust of Visionary artist William Blake on an altarpiece will accompany an account of the history of visionary art.
Tool Live - Sacred Mirrors Banners
Second Floor of Entheon
Enter the Chaos, Order and Secret Writing world of Allyson Grey. Through her devotionally detailed paintings and ink drawings. Her Mystic Abstractions point to the fabric of spectral light at the foundations of consciousness.
Allyson Grey's "Chaos, Order, and Secret Writing"
Surrender to Love in the Family Room with Alex Grey's original paintings Kissing, Copulating, Pregnancy, Birth, Nursing and Holy Family. Take a journey through the relics of Alex and Allyson's provocative performance art rituals that led to the creation of Entheon. Also on view will be Gaia, one of Alex's most beloved monumental paintings.
Alex Grey's "Gaia"
Third Floor of Entheon
The most transcendental of Alex's masterworks, Theologue, Transfiguration, Oversoul, One, Net of Being, Cosmic Christ, Godself along with Allyson Grey's Jewel Net of Indra will line the walls of the Great Hall, meeting place for community gatherings.
Alex Grey's "Theologue"
Enter the brick archway into the Chapel of Sacred Mirrors. Reflect on 21 stages of the self, transforming from the physical body into pure infinite love energy and discover the creator within.
Entheon will point to the sacredness of all creation and to the future of unity and diversity in our planetary civilization.
Sacred Mirrors Room
      The ornamental concrete sculptures of Entheon will begin, if over $300,000 is raised in this Kickstarter.
With your help, ornamental concrete specialists in the Hudson Valley just 30 minutes from CoSM will create giant 3D print-outs of the sculptural features of Entheon. From those print-outs, molds will be made to cast all the sculptural elements in super-strong fiberglass reinforced concrete with a surface of crushed crystal aggregate.
It will take many unique molds to realize all of Entheon's exterior features. To attach the sculptures to three stories of brick, steel and concrete, the engineering alone will take $65,000. To complete the entire sculptural countenance -- $1.5M.
Entheon's 2-Story Side with Soul Birds
Angels of the 4 Directions
Emerging from the Angels of the Four Directions, DNA Dragons of Consciousness Evolution, ascend to the Steeple Head, the One.
Angel of the Four Directions
Godhead
By surrounding the entire building with one giant Godhead of many faces, Entheon portrays the unity of all wisdom paths and the interconnectedness of spirit.
Godhead
Steeplehead
The Steeplehead of Entheon suggests the people of four directions coming together in visionary oneness, a pinnacle of Sacred Unity where humanity meets divinity.
Steeplehead
Allyson Grey's Secret Writing
Secret writing in every culture is like a window revealing thoughts through symbols in the material world. Representing the language of creative expression, Allyson Grey's Secret Writing forms a band between the roof and faces. Comprised of twenty unpronounceable letters, this original alphabet corresponds to the nameless presence existent in all sacred writing, the spirit imbedded in communication that cannot be reduced to concepts.
Allyson Grey's Secret Writing
 With your help, we will celebrate together the opening of Entheon in 2017! Entheon represents a future honoring the sacredness of all creation in our emerging planetary culture. It takes a community with the miracle of creative imagination to envision sacred space into existence and that is precisely what is happening. Please be part of this unique gift for future generations.
Entheon's Current Exterior
Thank you to the worldwide community whose contributions and purchases enable CoSM to raise the money to build a sanctuary of visionary art. The vision is manifesting before our eyes, join us at this important moment to complete the interior and begin the sculptural ornament.
Now it's time to complete the construction. Let's put the Sacred Mirrors back on view and begin the sculptural features that will distinguish Entheon as an inspiring pilgrimage place! Join us!
The inevitable consequence of love is the building of temples.
  Check out this video of Adam Jones from Tool speaking about Alex Grey's Art. 
See what Mariel Hemingway, Jeffrey Bronfam and Duncan Trussell have to say about the building of Entheon and Alex Grey & Allyson's Grey work. 
PLAY

                                                      At reward tiers $50 and above, increase your donation to add any of the following rewards. Please add $10 for shipping in the U.S and $20 International.
Check the survey at the end of the campaign to specify your add-on choices.
+ Lateralus Sawblade 8” Metallic Print: $77
+ Bicycle Day, by Alex Grey & Mars-1, 2013, Limited Edition Serigraph, 24 x 20 in. Each of the 419 prints is unique, slightly different and signed by both artists: $55
+ Varja Guru, Shpongled & Love is a Cosmic Force, signed Kickstarter Exclusive Posters: $25 add as many as you like, or collect all three!
+ Monochord, Body/Mind As A Vibratory Field, Glimpsing The Empyrean, signed metallic arch print, choice of one: $225
+ T-Shirt: $25
+ Flaming Eye Pendant: $55
+ CoSM Grail: $89
+ Chaos/Order Metallic Print Set signed by Allyson Grey: $150
+ Flaming Eye Plaque: $300
+ Theologue Metallic Print 12 x 36 in.: $400
+ Sacred Mirrors Frame Replica with Lenticular & Card Set: $500
+ Creating A Better World 12 x 12 in. Sculptural Tile: $1150
+ Soulbird 14" high: $2400
At any reward tiers you may increase your donation to add any of the following original works of art by Alex Grey or Allyson Grey. Before increasing your donation, please contact john.harris@cosm.org to confirm the original artwork is still available.
                Thank you to the CoSM M.A.G.I, Mystic Artists Guild International. 
Here are their original and limited edition offerings of contemporary masters: Aloria Weaver , Amanda Sage, Andriod Jones, Autumn Skye, Banjo, Bridgid Marlin, Burgandy Viscosi, Caren Charles, Carey Tompson, Carrie Ann Baade, Chris Dyer, David Heskin, Eric Nez, Johnathan Singer, Kuba Ambrose, Laurance Caruana, Mark Henson, Martina Hoffman , Maura Holden, Michael Divine, Morgan Mandala, Nikki Moon, Olga Kilmova, Randal Roberts, Robert Venosa, & Seth Lebowitz
If interested in any of the Add-Ons below, please contact john.harris@cosm.org to ensure they are still available.  
                                                                Co-Founders of CoSM, Alex Grey & Allyson Grey
The mystic paintings of Alex Grey articulate realms of psychedelic visionary consciousness, revealing interwoven energies of body and soul, love and spirit, illuminating the anatomical core of each being. Alex's visual meditations on the nature of life and consciousness, the subject of his art, have reached millions through his five books, the exhibition and extensive reproduction of his artwork, speaking appearances including a popular TED talk, stage sets for major rock bands, video animation, and Grammy award winning album art. http://www.alexgrey.com
Allyson Grey, MFA, is a painter, social sculptor, and Alex's creative collaborator, life partner and studio mate since art school in 1975. Allyson's paintings essentialize a world view of chaos, order and secret writing: the material world, the interconnected realm of energy + light and the sacred symbols of creativity. Through private consultations and her blog on art and life, "Ask Allyson," she serves as a muse to artists worldwide. http://www.allysongrey.com
Together the Grey's co-founded the Chapel of Sacred Mirrors (CoSM), a spiritual cultural center in the Hudson Valley of New York. On the forefront of a movement in which painters join musicians on stage, the Grey's have painted together live on Broadway stages and sold-out theaters, clubs and festivals in dozens of international cities across five continents. As long-time advocates of "cognitive liberty," a growing international "sacramental culture" has embraced the Grey's as important mapmakers and spokespersons for the visionary realm.
Allyson Grey, Zena Grey & Alex Grey
Editing
Thanks to Zena Grey, for heroically piecing together the Entheon Kickstarter video. An actress with more than ten films to her credit, Zena co-hosts monthly the Lost & Found Film Club in Hollywood. Look for her extraordinary short features created for Buzzfeed/SnapChat. http://www.zenagrey.com
CoSM Staff
Every member of CoSM Staff is essential to the fulfillment of this Kickstarter Campaign. Thanks especially to John Harris, Operations Manager for guiding us through.
Architects, Engineers and Builders
We thank Murdock/Solon Architecture, Shea Murdock and Michael Levy, for brilliant suggestions and plans for Entheon. We are grateful to Blue Sky Design for engineering, Michael Day, additional engineering, and for the man organizing the build of Entheon, Brian James chief builder.
3D Sculpting, Digital Effects and Videography
All of these visionary geniuses generously gave their time and services to the Entheon campaign. We are forever grateful.
To bring Alex's drawings into a new dimension, master digital sculptor, the Academy Award winning animator (Frozen & Zootopia), Ryan Tottle generously donated his talent to sculpt Alex's vision of Entheon. Thanks also to Alena Wooten-Tottle, an Academy Award winner, as well, [Frozen] for contributing the sculpting of Secret Writing on the Entheon model.
Thanks to Edge Visual world class digital effects artists, Edward Dawson-Taylor and Jackie Cooper, who set into motion the computer model of Entheon in its nature field.
http://www.edgevisual.co/ 
Instagram: @edgevisualvr 
Twitter: @edgevisualcg 
Facebook: www.facebook.com/edgevisual
Thanks to Mo Caicedo and Nick Martinelli at ~Hey Mister!~ for their brilliant Intro animation for the Entheon Kickstarter Video.
http://www.heymister.tv 
Instagram: heym1ster
Facebook: www.facebook.com/HeyMisterTv
Thanks to:
Louis Schwartzberg, for incomparable videography.
Shay Motion, for offering his special talent to the video.
Johnathan Singer for contributing luscious background effects to the campaign video.
KOAN for their contribution of superior music for the video.
Amanda Sage, Master Visionary painter, clothing designer, art professor, and CoSM Board Member who reached out to the finest Visionary artists working today for contributions to the original art rewards.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Many risks and challenges come with any construction project, especially when working with an unconventional design and new technologies. Man-hours required for completion are formidable. 

Fortunately, we have been blessed with a remarkably talented and supportive team of advisors to help overcome obstacles as they arise. Our top quality team includes experts in ornamental glass fiber reinforced concrete whose restoration includes the Metropolitan Museum of Art and Brooklyn Academy of Music.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear Friends of Entheon, 

Artful greetings with the first breaths of Hudson Valley springtime!
This message is to thank and reconnect with backers of our Kickstarter Campaign in 2016.
Thanks to the generosity of the global community, Entheon, Sanctuary of Visionary Art will indeed open in 2021.

Dear Friends,
Thank you again for all of your help towards the completion of Entheon, Sanctuary of Visionary Art. Thanks to all who have patiently awaited their rewards. That clearly took longer than we anticipated. If you are a backer and have not received your reward, check and be sure the backer survey was sent to us. To provide proper information, follow the link below to fill in shipping information and rewards will go out to you.
https://build-entheon-with-alex-grey-and-allyson-grey.backerkit.com/invites/r_0Kh8bbPOOaQWEQ50ybug/confirm

Dear Temple Builders,
With CoSMonauts working around the clock, we have fulfilled over 2,500 rewards in time for the holidays, but the remaining rewards are still being prepared. Deepest apologies, once again, for the delay in receiving your gifts.

updates.update_userinfo: Rewards Update: Shipments are on the way!
updates.update_content:
Thank you to all 2,792 backers who completed the Kickstarter Backerkit Survey, finalizing your shipping addresses. All backers who have filled out the Backerkit Survey should have received a digital PDF download entitled Entheon — a book just completed telling the story of the creation of the sanctuary of Visionary Art at CoSM. Also sent to all is a spoken word track from Art Psalms incorporating the music of David Starfire. The high-resolution image of Entheon for your desktop or phone has also been emailed.
CoSM's shipping team is working non-stop to release waves of packages. Nearly 1,200 have gone out and another 1,500 packages are in preparation. With hundreds of unique package types, reward sets are carefully packed and shipped with like orders going out as a group. Customs preparations for the first wave of international orders will ship next week.

Dear Temple Builders, 
We are excited to report that nearly all of our items have arrived, and we are preparing to ship starting next week. Thanks again for all of your patience as we design and produced forty-eight unique and brand new and diverse items. Creating all of these special gifts has empowered CoSM artists and designers to create jewelry, cast ceramic items, increase our offering of printed and sculpted gifts. Each item is being carefully proofed, sometimes re-proofed, for quality.

Dear Temple Builders,
Thank you, mystic souls, for joining us in raising Entheon! The mechanical systems, HVAC, sprinkler, and electrical, are being installed for the next few weeks. The Kickstarter money will be well used by these major expenses. There is still plenty of interior and site work to be done before Opening Day. Our target for opening is late 2017 when the building receive a certificate of occupancy. The exterior sculptures will follow. Thanks for partnering with us on this journey toward a sacred offering to our global community.

Four days left to submit your Backerkit Survey! Only 380 backers left to complete the survey!
This Friday, July 1st, all post campaign surveys will be locked down as production proceeds on all rewards.

Thank you for making our project a reality! A few things need to happen before we can kick off production and fulfillment. 
Here's a quick rundown:
First, Kickstarter is working to transfer over the funds so we have the money to make the rewards (this can take up to two weeks).

The success of the Build Entheon Kickstarter is due to the generosity of real life angels whose brilliance, art, organizational skills and intelligence was a gift of love.
Deep gratitude to our daughter, Zena who took time outside of her full-time gig creating for Buzzfeed/Snapchat and her monthly show in Hollywood, "The Lost & Found Film Club," to edit together a vast array of CoSM footage, articulating the vision of Entheon in the opening video representing the campaign. Check out Zena's creative videos and see her every month with her partner, Brendt in Hollywood presenting Lost & Found thematic extravaganzas. https://www.facebook.com/LostFoundFilmClub

This identity out of the One into the One and with the One is the source and fountainhead and breaking forth of glowing Love.                            – Meister Eckhart
Dear Entheon Builders,
Thank you to all 2,914 backers who brought the Build Entheon campaign to it's powerful finale! An outpouring of love and support kept the numbers rising, exceeding all  expectations and bringing us to a grand total of $354,917!

campaign.story:
THE WORLD’S MOST ADVANCED 3D AUDIO HEADPHONE
OSSIC X is the world’s first 3D audio headphone that instantly calibrates to the listener, increasing the sense of auditory space, and acoustically recreating the way you hear the world everyday. By pairing advanced 3D audio algorithms with head-tracking and individual anatomy calibration, we deliver incredibly accurate 3D sound to your ears. Experience music like never before. Get more immersed in virtual reality. Bring gaming to the next level.
 INSTANT CALIBRATION FOR A 10X AUDIO EXPERIENCE 
OSSIC X calibrates to the individual listener’s head and ear features, increasing overall sound quality and ensuring the most accurate sound placement, making for a listening experience that’s ten times more immersive than current technologies. 
Increased audio immersion 
Hear your movies and music like never before 
Increased sense of space with your audio content
Audio is a crucial part of the way we experience content. By implementing accurate 3D audio, any content can take the listener to new places by improving the following:
OSSIC X FOR VIRTUAL REALITY
In virtual reality, sound is key. With accurate 3D sound we can give a sense of space and direct your attention to elements outside your field of view for a more immersive experience. 
Drastically improved sound localization 
Increased sense of presence 
Accurately render sound in any x,y,z coordinate in space
OSSIC X FOR GAMING
Having accurate sound in gaming can make or break the experience, allowing you to know what’s going on in the spaces of the game that you can’t see. 
Immerse yourself in the game
Accurately position sounds for a competitive advantage 
Boomless mic for continued audio communication
OSSIC X FOR MOVIES
Imagine being able to watch any movie on the best speaker setup money can buy, from the comfort of your couch, bed, or anywhere. 
Enjoy any movie theater audio experience from wherever you are.
OSSIC X FOR MUSIC 
OSSIC changes the way you listen to music. Imagine being able to listen to any song from your collection on the best speaker setup money can buy, or hear a concert from the best seats in your favorite concert hall. 
Replicate the ideal listening room or speaker setup. 
Hear your music exactly how the artist intended.
See and hear what others have said about hearing 3D audio for the first time.
WE ALL HEAR THE WORLD DIFFERENTLY BASED ON OUR ANATOMY
How we hear the world is not a one-size-fits all situation. It's our physical anatomy that plays a critical role in defining how sound enters our ears. This is called our head related transfer function, or HRTF. Our individual HRTF is based on: 
Our position in space 
The size of our head 
The shape of our ears
TRADITIONAL HEADPHONES DON’T ACCOUNT FOR OUR ANATOMY
With traditional headphones the listeners anatomy is not taken into account. This makes for an incredibly small listening experience, where sound remains close to your head rather than around you. This leads to: 
A “close to your head” listening experience
Inaccurate ability to place sounds in space
Degradation in overall sound quality
CALIBRATION PUTS YOU BACK INTO THE LISTENING EQUATION
OSSIC X calibrates to the individual listener’s head and ear feature, increasing overall sound quality and ensuring the most accurate sound placement, making for a listening experience that’s ten times more immersive than current technologies. 
HOW IT WORKS
The OSSIC calibration process starts as soon as you put the headphones on. The data is instantly paired with our smart algorithms to determine accurate sound playback based on your anatomy and position. No laboratories required.
OSSIC X INSTANTLY MEASURES LISTENER'S ANATOMY
HRTF DATA IS INTEGRATED INTO OSSIC ALGORITHMS
MULTI-DRIVER ARRAY ENSURES ACCURATE SOUND LOCATION PLAYBACK
3D Audio naturally replicates the way we hear the world everyday, with measurable results. 
This is done with two types of testing: 
PHYSICS-BASED TESTING
Acoustical, physics-based testing. With a microphone in the ear, does the headphone reproduce the same signal as a real sound in space? Here we compared the OSSIC X to a gaming headphone. 
PEOPLE-BASED TESTING
We ask people where they think the sound comes from with the headphone on, and compare it to where the sound was supposed to come from. Here we can see the OSSIC X places sound at the right angle and depth and the gaming headphone does not.
Using the AUX or USB connection, OSSIC X is compatible with a multitude of devices to provide 3D audio playback.
While the OSSIC X already supports existing standard 2D formats such as stereo, 5.1, and 7.1, we want to make it easy for game and sound designers to go beyond. By using the OSSIC X, you can design fully immersive soundscapes without installing ceiling speakers or sitting in your studio.
FOR GAME ENGINES 
In gaming engines, the sounds can be tied to any objects or characters, and these are already natively positioned in 3D. Currently these sounds get compressed to, at most, 7 channels (and a subwoofer) on a ring around the listener. We are designing plugins that let natively 3D audio pass through to the listener.
We already have a prototype FMOD plug-in running, and it sounds great and operates efficiently. We are testing it with some early developers now. We would love to hear from you! Please fill out the survey to prioritize roll-out for the different platforms: Unity, Unreal, FMOD, Wwise, VST, AU, and/or others. 
Take our Developer Survey
FOR SOUND DESIGNERS 
For audio produced using standard DAWs, we will be supporting VST and AU.
ABBEY ROAD RED
OSSIC is proud to join the latest class of innovative companies at Abbey Road Red, a music and technology incubation program within the world famous Abbey Road Studios. More information can be found at http://www.abbeyroad.com/abbeyroadred
THX LIMITED
We’re excited to be working with THX to ensure that OSSIC X meets the highest standard for audio reproduction.
EVONEXUS INCUBATOR
OSSIC is proud to be supported by the EvoNexus Incubator in San Diego, CA.
Our other parters, friends, and supporters:
Thank you to everyone who has helped make this campaign possible. We wanted to also provide a few shout-outs to John Veleta and our amazing video team, Neology Concepts for helping spread the word, Nuuk Digital, and Gil Shterzer and Iddo Sternberg, for their help with our online marketing, and to all of our friends and family for their amazing support and dedication!
Stretch Goal 1: We'll be providing an additional USB cable with shipment for connections needing extra distance. 
Stretch Goal 2: We'll now incorporate packaging improvements including robust box design, travel handle and protective sleeve. These elements will make the box reusable and travel friendly.
Stretch Goal 3: We will now enable 3D audio connectivity through phones and tablets equipped with micro-USB. 
Stretch Goal 4: This stretch goal will allow 3D audio connectivity via Lightning cable to Apple phones and tablets. 
OSSIC started in a home living room in August 2014. Since that time, we’ve spent the last year and a half developing over 9 generations of prototypes and countless acoustic tests in order to bring accurate 3D audio to headphones. 
TESTING
PROTOTYPE DEVELOPMENT
The founding team in order: Jason Riggs - CEO, David Carr - CPO, Jose Arjol Acebal - COO, Joy Lyons, CTO
A MISSION TO CHANGE THE WAY WE HEAR SOUND
After working in the audio industry for a combined fifty years developing some of the top selling headphones and speakers on the market, our founding team realized there was a large gap in what was currently available for 3D sound, and what was possible. The technology was available, but limited by intensive laboratory calibration and typically coming at very high cost. The team believed that everyone should have access to the highest level of audio experience possible, so they formed OSSIC in 2015 with one mission: to redefine the way we hear sound by taking the final leap between reproduced audio and audio that's indistinguishable from reality.
We’re redefining the way we hear audio in headphones. While we’ve come this far with an incredibly small team and a boot-strapped budget, we need your help in making this technology a reality. 
 MANUFACTURING COSTS 
This is the most capital intensive part of our next phase. We’ve developed many headphones over the course of our careers, so we’ve got a very good idea on costs needed to produce the initial molds, purchase supplies, meet the minimum quantity order, and ship to consumers. We need your help to get us to the production phase of our hardware. 
CREATING THE NEXT GENERATION OF 3D AUDIO
Our goal is to not only develop a product, but help educate the world on the potential of what a 10X improvement in audio immersion can sound like. To do this, we need your support from this initial campaign to not only fund our production, but also get the word out about what we’re developing.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As with any hardware project, there are always schedule risks associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics.

The OSSIC team has successfully delivered hundreds of audio products to market. We understand the unique challenges of audio hardware and are familiar with how to avoid and mitigate any issues that arise. Additionally, we are working with a familiar tier-one manufacturing partner that builds for some of the best brands in the business.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello Backers,
It is with an extremely heavy heart that we must inform you that OSSIC is shutting down and will be unable to deliver the remaining OSSIC X headphones.
The OSSIC X was an ambitious and expensive product to develop. With funds from the crowdfunding campaign, along with angel investment, we were able to develop the product and ship the initial units. However, the product still requires significantly more capital to ramp to full mass production, and the company is out of money.

Today we have some exciting news.
After months of preparation, we’ve completed the manufacturing build for the limited number of OSSIC X Developer Edition Units and we are now making preparations for shipment!

Hi everyone!
Today we're excited to share some recent progress on the OSSIC X microphone array, which will be a key feature in the final product.

Hi everyone!
We hope everyone had a great weekend (and a short week last week).
Development Update
In addition to stand-alone capabilities which we previewed in the last update, the control apps for Mac and PC are also coming along nicely.

updates.update_userinfo: OSSIC X Development Update: Microphone Array Test Results
updates.update_content:
Hi Backers,
We have an exciting update for you this week!
OSSIC X Development Update
Over the last several weeks the team continued to focus on the OSSIC X software and achieved a major development milestone: the OSSIC X is now fully functional in standalone operation mode for multi-device compatibility, and that includes mobile devices. This means that the signal processing running on the headphone DSP is fully functional – including individualization, spatialization, head-tracking, and playback.

campaign.story:
The Slicks Travel System is a modular travel backpack with internal inserts designed to keep you organized and looking slick no matter where you are: at work, on the road, or exploring new places.
         That’s what we love about traveling, isn’t it? We’re never the same people at the end of the journey as we were when we started out.
But the luggage we bring with us stubbornly stays the same. Why is that?
Think about it: Right now, your closet is stuffed with pieces of luggage, each one with a single purpose.
Your carry-on roller bag is a box on wheels that has only seen the inside of airports and hotel rooms. You dread the wrinkles you have to iron out of your clothes when you get to your destination—that is, if the carry-on doesn’t get checked at the gate and then lost somewhere between connecting flights.
Your gym bag is a big, stinky sack of dirty laundry and toiletries all tossed together like a funk salad. When you go from the gym to work, you have to hide it under your desk or in the trunk of your car because it’s out of place in your buttoned-up office.
Your $500 hiking backpack is up on a shelf collecting dust. You bought it for a trip to Alaska. That was five years ago. It’s nice, but at 70 liters it’s too cumbersome and specialized to use as an everyday pack.
Your laptop bag is great for carrying your laptop. That’s it. But it’s a pain to get around with a laptop bag and a carry-on roller bag when you’re hailing a cab or riding the train to the airport.
Your cycling backpack makes your back sweaty and your clothes wrinkled. When you finally get to work, even after you change your clothes, you look like you’ve been biking through a torrential rainstorm.
Then there’s your well-worn backpack you’ve had for a decade. Its buckles are broken, there are holes in the bottom, and you have many painful memories of being the person at the front of the coffee shop line, dumping your personal effects onto the counter in a desperate hunt for your wallet.
So far, that’s six bags, each made for different functions, occasions and settings. Add to the mix your hydration pack for mountain biking, your briefcase, and the monogrammed fanny-pack your great-aunt gave you ---that’s a ton of baggage.
And what about all the emotional baggage? Stress, embarrassment, frustration, dread…
You don’t need all that baggage. 
You are one person on an amazing journey. 
You need one bag that transforms to reflect and simplify the many facets of your life.
That’s what the Slicks Travel System is all about.
The Slicks Travel System is designed as a modular luggage system, available either as a base backpack only or in three tailored options (SUIT, TRIP & BIZ), each with additional internal inserts to expand the function of the pack.
Let’s take a look the many ways your stuff can fit into the Slicks Travel System (and the many ways the Slicks Travel System will fit into your life).
Cool, huh?
Checkout these two videos we made that demonstrate better how you can pack up your Slicks:
For 2-3 days business trips
PLAY

For 3-4 days leisure holidays
PLAY

Now let’s take a closer look at the base backpack. 
Let’s say you need a great travel bag that can meet the demands of all kinds of travel, be it your daily commute to work, leisure getaway or business trip. You’ve got that with our 30 Litre capacity Slicks backpack. 
First of all, take a look at the exterior design:
There’s a reason we call it “Slicks.” We wanted to eliminate all of the hanging bits and bobs (aka “slop” in the baggage industry) and bulky pockets associated with backpacks. The result is a sleek, modern-yet-timeless shape. 
You get three color options to choose from: 
Discrete Black with grey back panel
Sporty Yellow with grey back panel
Stealthy All-Black with black back panel
Instead of external pockets, we’ve created discreetly-positioned interior pockets behind hidden zippers.
For added security, we have designed zipper pockets where you can stow the zipper pullers, making it difficult for thieves to easily access your valuables.
When needed, you can additionally lock up the main compartment and laptop compartment to secure your pack contents.
The front duffle-bag style pocket is a great spot for bulky and irregular shaped items that are the bane of most bags.
On the side, hidden behind a flap, you will find a dedicated compartment for your shoes.
The pack keeps your laptop safe and within easy reach thanks to a dedicated laptop compartment that fits devices up to 15-inches and is suspended for even better protection.
Need to do a quick change to a hipster street look or Mr. Professional? No problem- we've got you covered with Slicks.
Just stow away one of the shoulder straps and sling the other one over your shoulder to use your Slicks as a trendy messenger bag.
Or just unclip both the straps and tuck them away, and voila: your Slicks is an elegant attachè.
Here's how Slicks (and you!) transform:
And yes, unlike many bags claiming to be carry-ons, the Slicks pack is compliant with the latest IATA carry-on size recommendations.
The 600D PU-coated Nylon material is water resistant, but just for peace of mind, the pack comes with a seam-sealed, light-weight rain cover stashed in a hidden side pocket, ready to slip on in the event of a downpour.
And if you find yourself cycling at night or crossing roads in foggy weather, we have got plenty of reflective bits on the pack, zipper and rain over to keep you safe. And shiny.
Now let’s crack this baby open and see what’s on the inside:
You’ll notice that in addition to the classic “open from the top” access found in most backpacks, you can also open the Slicks like a suitcase and lay it flat — the clamshell style makes packing easier. 
Oh, and what’s this? More pockets? Yep: a pocket for storing valuables, another one for documents, and a mesh pocket as well.
Now that we’ve gotten to know the base pack, let’s acquaint ourselves with what makes the Slicks Travel System a System: the modular inlays. 
Are you always on the move, commuting from work to play or vice versa? The SUIT option is designed for anyone who needs to look dapper while they’re on the road.
With the SUIT option, the Slicks backpack comes with an ingenious removable Suitcover that keeps your business suit and shirt secure and wrinkle-free in your bag.
Check this out: a nifty collapsible hanger for easy storage. 
Are you a road warrior? The TRIP option is the perfect travel companion for work or for adventure. It combines the backpack with a removable Tripcover, a clever and compact double-sided mobile wardrobe for organising your clothes and toiletries.
There are loads of hidden compartments--some you may not discover until your second or third trip!
The front side of the Tripcover features two large zip-around compartments, each with additional zip-pockets - perfect for stashing your socks and underwear.
The top large pocket of the Tripcover is designed to pack your clothes, like your jeans and t-shirts.
It also houses a detachable “stink-proof” water-repellent laundry bag, roomy enough to contain a small pile of soiled clothes.
In the lower pocket of the Tripcover, you will find the essential 'dopp-kit'. The hanging washbag has every pocket imaginable including a super-sneaky spot for your contact lens case (no more blind groping around a hotel bathroom).
The dopp-kit is designed to also fit in the 'duffle-style' outside pocket of the backpack --- you end up with more space in the Tripcover to pack clothes. And it gives you easier access to it at airport security or for in-flight use.
The back of the Tripcover opens like a suitcase and there’s enough room in here for two or three shirts; there’s even a pocket for your tie.
The first thing you’ll notice inside is something you don’t see anywhere in travel gear: a Shirtcover with a collar protector--that’s right: no more crumpled collars. By the way, the Shirtcover was inspired by our co-founder, Curdegn’s inability to fold a dress shirt. We know he’s not alone in his exasperation. 
So to the millions of “folding challenged” out there: this one’s for you:
You’re all of these things: a career-driven professional, an adventure-seeking explorer, and a homebody who wants to relax in the park on a Sunday. For all of those aspects of you, we’ve created the BIZ option: an all-rounder featuring the Slicks backpack, the Suitcover, and the Tripcover. 
With BIZ, you are ready to configure your Slicks endlessly to adapt to your changing travel needs: business, leisure or commute.
PLAY

Here's a summary of all the four options that make up the Slicks Travel System:
We’re pretty sure we could stop here and let you click that green button right there to get your sweet Kickstarter deal on a Slicks, but we want you to be absolutely certain that Slicks is going to make your life on the road more organized and stress-free.
Let’s hear some stories from people who’ve gotten a chance to try out the Slicks Travel System. This is just a sampling of the rave reviews our test-nomads are sending back from the field.
Check out Peter. He was the first beta-user of a SLICKS Travel System (BIZ option), and for the past six months, he’s been putting it through its paces in every travel scenario you can imagine. In fact, he lived out of the SLICKS as his only bag for a two-week trip through Europe!
Say “Hi” to Mathias. He literally wrote the book on bicycle commuting. He started cycling to lose weight: he started at 350 lbs and within a year, lost 150 lbs. His daily trip is 14 miles each way. Every day. Year-round. Through all weather. In Minnesota.
Meet Kerry Hayes, editor and creator of airportlifestyle.com. She fell in love with travel so much that she married a commercial airline pilot. They both tried out the Slicks BIZ, and this is what they have to say:
As a token of our deep appreciation for choosing to pre-order your Slicks Travel System on Kickstarter and being uniquely patient to wait for it to be delivered, we have ensured that you'll benefit from MAJOR savings on our entire range.
Here is a summary of the reward options you can choose from:
  Full disclosure: 
As in, when you think of Swiss people climbing and skiing Alpine mountains and making the world more efficient, more neutral, and more punctual—we’re totally those guys (okay, so we don’t yodel. Otherwise—Swiss through and through).
Think Swiss Army Knife and CERN Large Hadron Collider: we have a national obsession with designing products that reflect and simplify the multifunctional and multidimensional nature of life. The Slicks Travel System is the natural evolutionary step in Swiss design.
As a product design house with engineers and industrial designers, we have over a decade of experience in designing and developing all things Swiss for our global partners. But that’s not where we stop - we also actively project manage production and global shipping logistics with leading contract manufacturers in Asia from our branch office in Taiwan. 
So we truly understand what it takes to scale up production and manage global logistics - we are not just a bunch of dorky designers. We’re also a bunch of production geeks.
We designed, developed and engineered a little gadget called the World Travel Adapter Pro+ for our partner, SKROSS. It’s the world’s safest and most compact 3-pole outlet adapter that connects to all 2- and 3-pole devices in 150-plus countries worldwide. It’s one of the most popular travel adapters globally and it won the prestigious Red Dot Design Award. It’s an ultimate embodiment of everything that is clever from Switzerland. But enough bragging. 
So we understand what it takes to design and produce a brilliant product that not only solves problems encountered by travelers, but we also know what it takes to create something that will sell like hotcakes. Compact, efficient, beautifully-designed Swiss hotcakes. (We call them crepes.) 
When our co-founder and lead designer, Remo, was a young Swissling in Industrial Design School back in 2004, he wanted to create a way to make hiking backpacks move more naturally with the human body. His patented design, the Flexible Link based backpack carrier, earned him an award in the prestigious Swiss National Design Competition: he used the prize money to start our product design and development company, FLINK in 2005 along with Curdegn, our CEO. 
We later went on to create several backpack designs for German bike ergonomics manufacturer, ERGON and other global partners. In other words, designing backpacks is our passion.
Oh, right. In 2011, we created an early version of the Slicks backpack to solve a common problem for business professionals: creating a way to both carry a suit wrinkle-free and all their work stuff while commuting. So we came up with the first Slicks backpack with a suit protector insert. It proved to be very popular and got rave reviews from industry experts.
After we started to use the original Slicks bag for activities like overnight travel or just walking around town, we realized there were more possibilities to explore. So we improved the overall design of the Slicks backpack and designed a series of modular inlays. The result was a pack that could go anywhere, for any purpose. Thus, the Slicks Travel System was born.
As mentioned above, being Swiss means we have a cultural imperative to be outdoorsy. We’re mountain bikers and climbers (no kidding - that's really Remo pictured above!), we’re skiers and snowboarders, we’re avid travellers  and we’re also parents and business owners. 
Whether we use them as a place to stash our gear, a change of clothes, spare diapers, or important business documents, backpacks go pretty much wherever we go. And we needed a backpack like Slicks Travel System to reflect our lifestyles, which are multifaceted.
Here is the nitty gritty of the Slicks Travel System:
First of all, you rock. We want you to know that.
Here’s the magic green button that will make our dreams a reality and your future travel experiences awesome. Click it.
Now you’re in for some fun. Once you pick your reward level, you’ll be entered into our Slicks community. We’ll send you campaign updates, product status checks, and love-notes just because.
Just in case you missed something, as we tend to gush endlessly about the glory of the Slicks Travel System. As its creators, we simply can't help it. It’s our baby.
Yes:
Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for coming this far with us on the journey to making Slicks a reality. Just the fact that you’ve taken the time out of your busy internet-browsing schedule to check out our project means more to us than you can know. 
Even if you’re just window-shopping, please: let your friends know about this amazing bag. If one of them becomes a Slicks user, they’ll never stop thanking you AND you’ll have a happier, less-stressed, well-traveled friend with loads of stories to tell about their journeys.
From the Slicks team to you, may you always love your journey.
This project is promoted by Jellop, a direct­ response online advertising agency specializing in Kickstarter campaigns on Facebook Ads and Google AdWords.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As with any journey, we can stumble upon unexpected events as we embark on the mission to produce and deliver you your Slicks Travel System. We have worked hard to set in place all the elements needed to ensure we produce and deliver on time (remember, we are Swiss - we plan, execute and deliver on schedule - punctuality is in our blood!)

Manufacturing - Did we mention: we’re using the same manufacturer for Slicks as the one who made our very first backpack that we designed and produced for our partner, ERGON back in 2006? Over the last decade, we have worked with them to design and produce several backpacks for our clients. We share a deep professional and personal relationship with the manufacturer. Curdegn’s kids and the owner’s kids play together when Curdegn travels with his family to head our office in Taiwan. So basically, we have a lot of history working with this world class manufacturer. They aren’t going to let us down. 

Complexity of order fulfilment - Everyone knows that some Kickstarter projects have issues fulfilling pledges on time. Given our extensive experience with integrated product development, you’re not going to have that problem with us: we have our manufacturing agreements in place, we have warehouses and logistical partnerships set up in the U.S., Central Europe, Hong Kong and Australia, and your Slicks bag will be ready to be produced & shipped once this project is funded.

Product adjustments - As we continue to test and trial the bags, we may need to make some small adjustments to improve the product. These will always be for the benefit of you, the user - and we'll let you know any time we improve something.

Customs - For backers in US, European Union, Switzerland & Australia, we will deliver your goods customs cleared, as we already have warehouse partnerships established in these regions. For backers from other places globally, we'll work hard to avoid your rewards getting held up at customs, but in the end *we can't guarantee you won't experience delays or be charged import duties*.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
What a journey, folks. We’re truly humbled by the outpouring of support from you, our travel-loving Slicks community of backers. When we started our Kickstarter journey with this, our first campaign, we never imagined this is where we would reach.
There aren’t enough languages on the planet to express the depths of our gratitude for making our Kickstarter campaign such a huge success, but here are some ways to say “thank you” in the native tongues of our global community of Slicksters:

We are thrilled to have crossed Fr. 500,000 (seems unreal right?) and as promised, here are the details of our 'surprise' stretch goal you all helped UNLOCK:
Introducing Slicks Stealth: a super-sleek all-black color option with black back panel. This discrete version of the Slicks pack was designed for all of you office ninjas out there who want to keep the fact that you’re carrying a backpack as your work bag as your crafty little secret. Besides, all black is the new black.

Our campaign is now gaining momentum, with still 9 days remaining! We just crossed our Fr. 250,000 Stretch Goal #1 today and the Slicks family is now more than 1000 strong. We still can't believe it. A big thanks to every single one of you who backed us till date!
We have decided to announce new stretch goals that will definitely make you excited (All amounts are in Swiss Francs):
1. Stretch Goal #2 - unlocked at Fr. 350,000

campaign.story:
This is the final day! If you're reading this, we need YOU to support and push us over the line! Pick your reward and support today!
This is what audiences and experts are saying about "Why Not Home?" 
“Why Not Home? is a thoughtful look at complex issues. It’s down to earth style puts a human spin on the contentious topic of home birth. I hope that every expectant parent, as well as medical and nursing students see this film. There is something for everyone in this beautifully done film.”
 — Robin Elise Weiss, PhD, MPH, LCCE and President of the Lamaze Board
“Great film, very moving, I want my husband and skeptics to watch it! ” 
— Vanessa, Expectant Mother
“Why Not Home? captures the beauty of natural birth in a way that is so hard to articulate. It shows inspiring stories of how medical professionals can collaborate to make birth better, and how women can be empowered in the process. Medical professionals and women need to see this film because it demonstrates what some of us already know, low risk birth should be considered simple and normal.” 
— Jessica Taylor Goldstein, MD Family Medicine Obstetrical Care Provider and Resident Educator
"This beautifully made film answers the question that so many medical professionals ask with incredulity, “Why would anyone choose to have their baby AT HOME?” by sharing the stories of several of the filmmakers medical colleagues who made the unconventional choice to give birth outside of the hospital. I believe this lovely and articulate film will change the conversation and open up greater inquiry within the hospitals and medical schools in which the filmmaker intends to screen Why Not Home. And the public will surely benefit as well."
— Audrey Levine, LM, CPM, Vice-President NACPM and Legislative and Policy Chair Midwives Alliance of Washington State
For more reviews, click here. 
Our goal with this campaign beyond raising funds is to engage our audience. We want 750 NEW backers in 15 days. That means 50 backers every day. If you are reading this, today YOU are one of those 50! 
Every backer counts regardless of the amount. 
Ultimately we want this film to get out to at least 250 communities across the country and around the world. That won't happen on its own. 
Help us get the word out and demonstrate to potential broadcasters, festival producers, and distributors that this film has an engaged and active following. 
In the film world the rule of thumb is that you should spend as much on outreach and distribution as you do on production. That may be true for larger films without an already engaged audience, but we believe this budget combined with our grassroots network of supporters will ensure this film gets out into the hands of those who need to see it. 
We will use funds raised for the following:
Discussion Guide 
Outreach 
Publicity 
Updated and Interactive Website 
Final sound edit and mix 
Festival submission fees 
Deliverables (DVDs, etc.)
Kickstarter Fees and Rewards
We have made a great film with the potential to impact the health of women and families around the world. 
After a few finishing touches the next step is getting it out! That's what this campaign is all about.
To guide us along the way, we are working with Film Sprout, a group with extensive experience in grassroots distribution for independent social issue documentaries.
We want to create meaningful discussions about maternity care where it is happening, in communities. We believe that it will take action across settings and stakeholders to create significant and lasting change. 
We have positioned this film in a way that speaks across the traditional divisions in maternity care. 
Together, we can increase understanding and access to choices. We can move toward real improvements in maternity care, improvements that benefit women, families, and society whether they choose to give birth at home, hospital, or birthing center. 
Please don't wait. Join us today and show your support. 
Thank you!
Jessicca and the "Why Not Home?" Team
 Fiscally sponsored by:
If you're wondering what kind of impact this film could have, just watch this first year med student's reaction after watching the first 20 minutes. 
We think community birth should be part of the curriculum at medical and nursing schools. When you support this campaign you give us the resources we need to reach out to colleges and universities to engage them in this important discussion. 
THE TEAM
This project has been a collaborative effort involving so many talented and passionate individuals. Learn more about the team when you click here.
